translation.en: they'll swear I'm crying for a different reason."

translation.en: I'm getting caught up on what you guys are...
translation.zh: 我就快被带进你们说的…

translation.en: [Michelle] I crave some longer experiences with young people...
translation.zh: 我渴求跟年轻人相处更长时间

translation.en: through the community events.
translation.zh: 通过社区活动

translation.en: The tour could do a great job of giving me a little taste of it.
translation.zh: 巡回就能帮我实现一点这个渴求

translation.en: [girl] How do you feel, like... How do I put this?
translation.zh: 你觉得…我该怎么说呢？

translation.en: How do you feel, transitioning back to your normal life?
translation.zh: 你觉得回归正常生活后是什么感觉？

translation.en: Because, like, it got... I don't want to say "interrupted."
translation.zh: 因为之前你的生活…我不想用“打扰”这个词

translation.en: But it was, like, a huge...
translation.zh: 就是感觉就像一个巨大的…

translation.en: [Michelle] You can say it.
translation.zh: 你说吧

translation.en: It was, like, a huge bump in the road.
translation.zh: 就像有个巨大的石块在路中间

translation.en: You were going to live this normal life, and then your husband became president.
translation.zh: 你本觉得自己的生活会一直很平常但突然你丈夫成了总统

translation.en: So how does it feel, trying to get back on track of your normal life
translation.zh: 那你回归正常生活后的感觉如何？

translation.en: that you had before?
translation.zh: 回到之前的生活

translation.en: [Michelle] What I've learned is, "Get back on what track?"
translation.zh: 我感受到的是这并不是我之前的生活

translation.en: It's a whole new track.
translation.zh: 而是一个全新的生活

translation.en: It's not going back. It's not...
translation.zh: 我的生活无法回到过去…

translation.en: You know, it's just all different, and it's different forever.
translation.zh: 一切已经完全不同 永远变不回去了

translation.en: So it's not getting back on track,
translation.zh: 所以我现在不是回归之前的生活

translation.en: but it's creating my next track.
translation.zh: 而是在创造新的生活

translation.en: I'm doing what you're doing.
translation.zh: 我跟你们在做的事是一样的

translation.en: I'm figuring out, "What do I want to do?
translation.zh: 我在寻找自己想做的事

translation.en: What do I care about?"
translation.zh: 和我在意的事

translation.en: And it takes time to process your life
translation.zh: 弄清楚生活

translation.en: and figure out what it all means.
translation.zh: 和弄清它的意义所需要花时间

translation.en: So little of who I am happened in those eight years.
translation.zh: 而过去的八年里我只弄清楚了一小部分

translation.en: So much more of who I was happened before.
translation.zh: 我探索出生活的意义更多是在八年前发生的

translation.en: [Melissa] So are you guys going to take a final look when you're done
translation.zh: 这边完事后你们可以去最后检查一次

translation.en: at the monitors in the foyer?
translation.zh: 门厅里的监控器吗？

translation.en: Mrs. Obama's ready.
translation.zh: 奥巴马女士准备好了

translation.en: I'm ready too.
translation.zh: 我也准备好了

translation.en: [Gayle] So tell us about Michelle Obama as a little girl,
translation.zh: 跟我们说说米歇尔小时候的故事

translation.en: because she says she was feisty,
translation.zh: 因为她说她小时候非常坚强

translation.en: and that part of you really liked her feistiness.
translation.zh: 而你欣赏她的这种坚强

translation.en: -True? -[Marian] I did.
translation.zh: -是真的吗？-是的

translation.en: Well, it goes back to Craig.
translation.zh: 这就要说回克雷格了

translation.en: I think I was too soft with him,
translation.zh: 我觉得我对他太温柔了

translation.en: trying to make him the nice little boy,
translation.zh: 想让他变乖

translation.en: -That's right. -[Marian] And I don't think that works.
translation.zh: -是没错-但我想那根本没用

translation.en: So I decided I would...
translation.zh: 所以我…

translation.en: She was too soft on you.
translation.zh: 她对你太温柔了

translation.en: [Craig] No, she made me too soft.
translation.zh: 不 是她让我变温柔了

translation.en: She was too strict.
translation.zh: 她太严格了

translation.en: Your sister took the brunt of that. I hope you feel bad.
translation.zh: 你妹妹替你承担了压力我希望你有感到抱歉

translation.en: [Gayle] Do you feel you have your life back?
translation.zh: 你重回自己的生活了吗？

translation.en: Do you miss the White House at all?
translation.zh: 你想念白宫吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Gayle] No?
translation.zh: -不-是吗？

translation.en: Not at all.
translation.zh: 完全不想

translation.en: -[Gayle] All right. Bye, team. -OK. All right.
translation.zh: -好 再见 各位-好了

translation.en: -I'll see you guys tonight. Bye-bye. -OK. All right.
translation.zh: -今晚见-好

translation.en: -[Gayle] Bye. -[Melissa] Bye.
translation.zh: -再见-再见

translation.en: -Hello. -I thought you were wearing the pink.
translation.zh: -你们好啊-我以为你穿的是粉色的

translation.en: No, that was for earlier, and that had food on it.
translation.zh: 不是 那是之前的 而且沾了吃的

translation.en: [Melissa] That's the evening attire.
translation.zh: 那是晚礼服

translation.en: -That was for the day. -That looks like two belts.
translation.zh: -那是这一天的亮点-这看起来像是有两条腰带

translation.en: It's one belt, but it's three separate...
translation.zh: 只有一条 但分了三段

translation.en: Oh, it's got a top belt too.
translation.zh: 这上面还有一个

translation.en: -Oh, I see. -[Michelle] Yep, this, this, and this.
translation.zh: -我懂了-对 这个、这个和这个

translation.en: But it's not separated?
translation.zh: 但它们不是分开的？

translation.en: [Michelle] No. It's one belt, but you buckle it three different times.
translation.zh: 不是 它们是一整条但你要扣三次扣子

translation.en: And is that the style, to have your belt so high now?
translation.zh: 现在流行把腰带系那么高吗？

translation.en: Is that the style?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: -[Michelle] I don't know-- -People, what's so...
translation.zh: -我不知道…-各位 有什么好笑的…

translation.en: -[Michelle] I don't... -[Craig] I just asked if it was the style.
translation.zh: -我不…-我只是问是不是流行

translation.en: [woman] Don't get her in a bad mood.
translation.zh: 这跟你无关

translation.en: -Come on, zip it. -Let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 把嘴巴闭上 我们走

translation.en: That was a compliment. I like the belt up that high.
translation.zh: 我这是表扬 我喜欢高腰带

translation.en: -I don't know what people-- -It looks like a holster.
translation.zh: -我不知道人们…-看起来像手枪皮套

translation.en: Like, if you had some...
translation.zh: 就像如果你有…

translation.en: -You could. It's when I... -You shouldn't laugh.
translation.zh: 你可以的 当我… 你不能笑

translation.en: -[Craig] That's what I was talking about. -That's the problem.
translation.zh: -我就是那个意思-问题就出在这里

translation.en: -[Melissa] Come on, Craig. -[mouths]
translation.zh: 好了 克雷格

translation.en: [Michelle] My brother, my big brother...
translation.zh: 我哥哥…

translation.en: You know, he was my first crush, my big brother.
translation.zh: 他就像是我的初恋

translation.en: My brother's the kind of person... Everybody liked Craig.
translation.zh: 我哥哥克雷格是那种所有人都喜欢的人

translation.en: You know, my mother liked Craig better than me.
translation.zh: 比起我 我妈更喜欢克雷格

translation.en: I joke about this all the time.
translation.zh: 我总是拿这个说笑

translation.en: You know, we would have Thanksgiving at the White House.
translation.zh: 我们会在白宫过感恩节

translation.en: And I'd be around. There'd be butlers and stuff going on.
translation.zh: 我会在白宫走动然后管家们都在忙东忙西

translation.en: And, "Where's Craig?
translation.zh: 我妈会问：“克雷格在哪？

translation.en: But when's Craig coming?"
translation.zh: 克雷格什么时候来？”

translation.en: And I was like, "Ma. Come on, lady.
translation.zh: 我说：“妈 怎么着？

translation.en: I am the First Lady. What more do I have to do?"
translation.zh: 我是第一夫人 这还不够吗？”

translation.en: You know? I mean...
translation.zh: 你们懂吗？我的意思…

translation.en: [Craig] Everybody in the world knows who she is.
translation.zh: 世界上所有人都知道她

translation.en: That's incredible.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: Everybody in the world knows who my sister is.
translation.zh: 世上每一个人都知道我妹妹

translation.en: What is that? That's dumb.
translation.zh: 这叫什么事？太夸张了

translation.en: Nobody should have to deal with that. No one.
translation.zh: 没人能应对这种事 没人

translation.en: No brother should have to deal with their sister
translation.zh: 没有任何一个哥哥能应对

translation.en: being the most popular person in the world.
translation.zh: 她妹妹是世上最受欢迎的人这件事

translation.en: -Ooh, it's chilly. Hey, Mommy. -[Marian] It is chilly.
translation.zh: -有点冷啊 嘿 妈妈-是有点冷

translation.en: -[woman] Sorry for the snow. -[Craig] Take you on a tour...?
translation.zh: -抱歉下雪还让你出来-没事 带你去转一转吗？

translation.en: [woman] If it weren't you, we'd be able to put the blinds up.
translation.zh: 如果不是你我们就能把窗帘拉上去了

translation.en: [Craig] Yeah.
translation.zh: 就是

translation.en: -[Michelle] That's a preference. -[woman] Is she allowed...
translation.zh: -这样会更好而已-她可以…

translation.en: What, are those people terrorists? Are they going to attack?
translation.zh: 那些人是恐怖分子吗？他们打算搞袭击吗？

translation.en: -[Craig] See, that's not right, Mich. -[Michelle] No.
translation.zh: -你看 这就不对了-不对

translation.en: [Marian] Craig always has a good supply of wine.
translation.zh: 克雷格总是有很好的酒

translation.en: -Right. So we have some kale salad. -I love coming here and drinking his wine.
translation.zh: -对 我们做了甘蓝沙拉-我很喜欢来这里喝他的酒

translation.en: [Michelle] I have wine too.
translation.zh: 我也有酒

translation.en: -[Marian] I know... -Did you see it? Chynna, you still saw it.
translation.zh: -我知道-你看到了吗？你还是看到了

translation.en: "I got wine too."
translation.zh: 我也有酒

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 她说得对

translation.en: I get the special wine.
translation.zh: 我有不一样的酒

translation.en: Mich just gets White House wine.
translation.zh: 米歇只有白宫的酒

translation.en: "When I come to Craig's house..."
translation.zh: “我来克雷格家时…”

translation.en: [Craig] That's right, Ma. You tell her.
translation.zh: 对 妈 你告诉她

translation.en: "...I just get... The wine is just..."
translation.zh: “我能喝到酒…”

translation.en: -I'm gonna have some of this wine. -Here's some of my wine.
translation.zh: -我要尝下这个酒-给你我的酒

translation.en: Here, refill mine.
translation.zh: 给我的满上

translation.en: Let me see. Wait, let me see. Let me see.
translation.zh: 让我尝尝 等等

translation.en: [Kelly] Family.
translation.zh: 家族

translation.en: [Michelle] These are my favorite pictures.
translation.zh: 这些是我最喜欢的照片

translation.en: [Marian] God, that tree looks ugly.
translation.zh: 上帝啊 那棵树太丑了

translation.en: Because you actually let us decorate the tree.
translation.zh: 因为你让我们装饰了

translation.en: That's why it looks ugly.
translation.zh: 所以才那么丑

translation.en: Because a seven-year-old did that.
translation.zh: 因为那是一个七岁小鬼装饰的

translation.en: Oh, here's the...
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: [Marian] Oh, there's the dress.
translation.zh: 这是那裙子

translation.en: You can see all these pleats.
translation.zh: 你能看到这些褶皱

translation.en: [Michelle] Look how pretty you are, Mommy.
translation.zh: 你看你多美 妈妈

translation.en: -[Craig] Could have been on TV, in movies. -[Michelle] So young.
translation.zh: -美到可以上电视 演电影…-真年轻

translation.en: -Were you excited about your wedding? -[Marian] I think so.
translation.zh: -你当时为结婚感到激动吗？-激动吧

translation.en: At least you weren't pregnant, because I didn't come until later.
translation.zh: 至少你不是未婚先孕因为我是你们婚后才出生的

translation.en: "I might have been happy about it."
translation.zh: “我应该是觉得开心的”

translation.en: [Marian] I haven't seen it in a long time, but...
translation.zh: 我已经很久没看到他了 但…

translation.en: that was good.
translation.zh: 这挺好的

translation.en: That was good.
translation.zh: 挺好的

translation.en: [Craig] Do you know, the last time we went through these pictures like this
translation.zh: 你们知道上次我们像这样一起看照片

translation.en: had to be when Dad was alive.
translation.zh: 还是爸爸在世的时候吗？

translation.en: [Marian] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: He just liked people.
translation.zh: 他很喜欢人

translation.en: [Michelle] Look how handsome Dad is.
translation.zh: 你们看 爸爸多帅啊

translation.en: [Michelle] I am from the South Side of Chicago.
translation.zh: 我来自芝加哥南部

translation.en: That tells you as much about me as you need to know.
translation.zh: 这点就足够让你了解我了

translation.en: It was a typical working-class community.
translation.zh: 那是个典型的工人阶层社区

translation.en: Some good music,
translation.zh: 有动听的音乐

translation.en: some good barbecue,
translation.zh: 美味的烧烤

translation.en: some good times.
translation.zh: 和愉快的时光

translation.en: Our dinner table was the first table I felt like I belonged.
translation.zh: 我家的餐桌是第一张让我有归属感的桌台

translation.en: And then you go out into the world
translation.zh: 而后你走向世界

translation.en: expecting the same thing.
translation.zh: 希望找到同样的感觉

translation.en: You're in high school,
translation.zh: 你上高中时

translation.en: you are accomplished.
translation.zh: 非常优秀

translation.en: You are... Was it class treasurer? Do I remember that right?
translation.zh: 你是班上的财务干部 对吗？

translation.en: I was senior class treasurer, yes.
translation.zh: 我是班级高级财务干部 没错

translation.en: I was still that kid.
translation.zh: 而当时我还小

translation.en: You were on the honor roll,
translation.zh: 你的成绩名列前茅

translation.en: and you went to go see your guidance counselor,
translation.zh: 你去找辅导老师

translation.en: and your brother had gone to Princeton,
translation.zh: 因为你哥进了普林斯顿大学

translation.en: and you thought, "I'm gonna aspire to go to Princeton too."
translation.zh: 所以你觉得自己也能上普林斯顿

translation.en: But that guidance counselor had other ideas,
translation.zh: 但你的辅导老师却不那么认为

translation.en: didn't see in you what you saw in yourself.
translation.zh: 她没有看到你看到的自我潜力

translation.en: Yeah, she decided that my wish to go to Princeton
translation.zh: 对 她觉得我去普林斯顿

translation.en: was thinking too big,
translation.zh: 是不可能的

translation.en: I was reaching too high.
translation.zh: 她觉得我的想法过于远大

translation.en: And at that point, she told me, "I don't think you're Princeton material."
translation.zh: 当时她跟我说“我觉得你不是上普林斯顿的料”

translation.en: -The nerve! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真没脑筋-对

translation.en: Well, she was wrong.
translation.zh: -她错了-对

translation.en: I went back to the school just recently and the principal was like,
translation.zh: 我最近刚回了趟高中然后校长跟我说

translation.en: "She doesn't work here anymore."
translation.zh: “她已经不在这里工作了”

translation.en: I was like, "I bet she doesn't."
translation.zh: 我说：“最好是这样”

translation.en: [Michelle] I share that because obviously it worked out OK. Um...
translation.zh: 我分享这段经历是因为最后我还是上了普林斯顿

translation.en: But that statement, while I was able to get over it, it was a punch.
translation.zh: 但那句话给了我不小的打击我过了很久才缓过来

translation.en: I'm still a little salty...
translation.zh: 我还是有点耿耿于怀

translation.en: ...about that.
translation.zh: 对于那句话

translation.en: Still a little salty about it.
translation.zh: 还是耿耿于怀的

translation.en: Your book really stuck to me,
translation.zh: 你的书真的很让我感动

translation.en: how just so much that African-American women go through
translation.zh: 让我切身看到非裔美国女人的经历

translation.en: and African-American individuals go through, as a whole.
translation.zh: 和非裔美国人整体的经历

translation.en: And we go through those alone.
translation.zh: 我们都是一个人在努力

translation.en: We don't have backup. We don't have support.
translation.zh: 我们没有援助 没有帮助

translation.en: With me being a first-generation student,
translation.zh: 我是第一代学生

translation.en: I've lived in subsidized housing all my life.
translation.zh: 一直以来都住在政府补助的房子里

translation.en: I didn't believe that I would be sitting
translation.zh: 我真的想不到自己能有一天

translation.en: next to the former First Lady of the United States.
translation.zh: 能坐在前美国第一夫人的身边

translation.en: And I just wanted to know, how did you, as a black woman,
translation.zh: 我想问作为一名黑人女性

translation.en: persevere through, just, invisibility?
translation.zh: 你如何克服被忽视的这一困境？

translation.en: For me, I never felt invisible.
translation.zh: 我从未觉得自己被忽视

translation.en: And I think, in thinking through my story about why do I not now feel invisible,
translation.zh: 我觉得在我回顾我过去的人生为何没有这种感觉

translation.en: I think it's because my parents
translation.zh: 应该是因为我的父母

translation.en: made me always feel visible.
translation.zh: 总是让我觉得我是被关注的

translation.en: It came from not what was going on in the world,
translation.zh: 这并不是世界给予我的

translation.en: but what was going on at my dinner table.
translation.zh: 而是我在家里的餐桌上感受到的

translation.en: My mother, she let us ask anything.
translation.zh: 我母亲允许我们问任何问题

translation.en: You had to be polite.
translation.zh: 但我们得礼貌

translation.en: We got spankings if we were too... You know?
translation.zh: 如果我们太…你懂得 就会被打屁股

translation.en: -She was still a black mother. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 她终究还是个黑人母亲

translation.en: But that invisibility, it starts here.
translation.zh: 被忽视感源自于心灵

translation.en: We can't afford to wait for the world to be equal to start feeling seen.
translation.zh: 我们不能光等着世界看到我们给予我们公平

translation.en: We're far from it.
translation.zh: 这还需要很长时间

translation.en: Time will not allow it.
translation.zh: 我们无法等那么久

translation.en: It's not going to happen with one president, one vote.
translation.zh: 这不是一个总统 一张投票能解决的

translation.en: So you've gotta find the tools within yourself to feel visible,
translation.zh: 所以你要在你自己身上找办法让自己不被忽视

translation.en: and to be heard, and to use your voice.
translation.zh: 被听见 让自己发声

translation.en: I have high expectations of young people.
translation.zh: 我对年轻人的期许很高

translation.en: It's the same expectations my family had of me.
translation.zh: 就跟我家人对我一样

translation.en: My grandfather Dandy expected us to be great.
translation.zh: 我爷爷丹迪希望我们能成为伟人

translation.en: But he went through life being underestimated.
translation.zh: 但他一生都没有受到应有的重视

translation.en: Growing up, he was a brilliant young man,
translation.zh: 我爷爷年轻时是个优秀的青年

translation.en: somebody that loved to read books,
translation.zh: 酷爱读书

translation.en: loved to delve into things in a deep and meaningful way.
translation.zh: 钻研有意义的事物

translation.en: He could have been a professor. He could have been a doctor.
translation.zh: 他本可以成为一名教授、医生

translation.en: But because of race and class,
translation.zh: 但就因为种族和阶层

translation.en: he couldn't get into colleges.
translation.zh: 他无法进入大学

translation.en: He didn't have the money, the resources...
translation.zh: 他没有钱和资源…

translation.en: And imagine walking around with all this ability,
translation.zh: 他就这样满怀能力和抱负 寻寻觅觅

translation.en: and the world telling you, "No.
translation.zh: 却被世界拒绝

translation.en: No, you're not good enough. No, you're not ready."
translation.zh: “你不够优秀 不够资格”

translation.en: Watching people half your intelligence
translation.zh: 只能眼睁睁看着能力仅及你一半的人

translation.en: being promoted past you.
translation.zh: 被升职加薪超越你

translation.en: You know, watching opportunities slip away,
translation.zh: 眼睁睁看着机会从指缝流走

translation.en: not because you're not able, but because nobody thinks you deserve it.
translation.zh: 并不是因为你没有能力而只是因为没人相信你能胜任

translation.en: That caused him a lot of disappointment and anger.
translation.zh: 这带给了他极大的失望和悲愤

translation.en: That made him push us to be better.
translation.zh: 也成了他推动我们前进的动力

translation.en: [woman] This is a super-normal Wednesday.
translation.zh: （圣保罗岛 明尼苏达州） 这是个极度平常的周三

translation.en: Very normal.
translation.zh: 非常平常

translation.en: Every so often a book comes along that creates bridges.
translation.zh: 不时总是会有那么一本书能创造桥梁

translation.en: [Michelle] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [woman 2] So we thought it was a great idea to bring two book clubs together
translation.zh: 所以我们把两个读书俱乐部聚到一起

translation.en: to talk about their unique experiences with the book,
translation.zh: 来聊聊大家与这本书的独特的经历

translation.en: but also the common things.
translation.zh: 以及那些寻常的事

translation.en: You come from Chicago, also.
translation.zh: -你也是从芝加哥来的-我父母是

translation.en: -Where did you grow up? -My mom's from Gresham.
translation.zh: -你在哪里长大的？-我妈妈来自格瑞萨姆

translation.en: [Michelle] That's where Barack organized.
translation.zh: 贝拉克曾在那里为社区服务

translation.en: But it was fascinating to read because they were lifelong,
translation.zh: 但读这本书真的很受教因为他们在那里住了一辈子

translation.en: they lived there, they grew up there, family there, steeped there.
translation.zh: 他们在那里生活长大、组建家庭、经历人生起落

translation.en: And they were definitely part of the white flight.
translation.zh: 而且绝对是白人大迁移的一部分

translation.en: [woman 2] Do you have a sense of what they were fleeing
translation.zh: 你能感受他们逃离时的心境吗？

translation.en: -when they decided to leave? -Or did they even know?
translation.zh: 你能感受他们逃离时的心境吗？ 或者他们自身知道吗？

translation.en: [woman] I don't know that my parents did.
translation.zh: -我不知道我父母如何-对

translation.en: If you look at my parents' parents,
translation.zh: 但如果你看我父母的父母

translation.en: that's when you see, like, the veiled racism.
translation.zh: 他们生活的年代充斥着隐晦的种族歧视

translation.en: That's when you would hear the off-the-cuff remarks
translation.zh: 人们到处能听到别人的闲言碎语

translation.en: about, like, "Well, they're moving into the neighborhood."
translation.zh: 比如“他们要搬到这块区域了”

translation.en: And it was so interesting to read that from your perspective, versus what I knew.
translation.zh: 而有意思的一点是我能读到你的观点然后结合我所知道的知识

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: What was going on in the '70s
translation.zh: 1970年代发生的事是

translation.en: was that, as black families like ours were moving into neighborhoods,
translation.zh: 像我们这样的黑人家庭搬迁到一个区域

translation.en: white families were being scared away.
translation.zh: 那里的白人家庭就会被吓跑

translation.en: They were being told, "Sell your home quick.
translation.zh: 会有人告诉他们“赶紧卖掉你们的房子

translation.en: Your property values are gonna go down."
translation.zh: 这里的市值马上就要下降了”

translation.en: And so they fled further to the suburbs.
translation.zh: 所以他们就逃到了郊外

translation.en: You can even see it in class pictures of my kindergarten class
translation.zh: 你甚至可以从我的幼儿园班级照片

translation.en: and my eighth-grade class.
translation.zh: 还有初二班级照片里看出来

translation.en: I mean, it does something to kids like me,
translation.zh: 这件事对像我这样的孩子有一定影响

translation.en: and we have to remember that
translation.zh: 我们必须记住

translation.en: as we are pointing out people who belong and don't belong.
translation.zh: 因为大家都在区分谁属于这里 谁不属于

translation.en: Because my family, sadly,
translation.zh: 因为很遗憾的是

translation.en: was one of those families, to some, who didn't belong.
translation.zh: 对某些人来说我家就是不属于这里的家庭之一

translation.en: I ended up going to Princeton.
translation.zh: 我最后顺利进入普林斯顿大学

translation.en: I was one of a handful of minority students.
translation.zh: 我是为数寥寥的少数族裔学生之一

translation.en: It was the first time in my life where I stood out like that.
translation.zh: 那是我人生中第一次那么突出

translation.en: I learned that one of my roommates moved out
translation.zh: 我得知我的一个室友搬出去了

translation.en: because her mother was horrified that I was black.
translation.zh: 因为我的黑人身份让她妈妈很害怕

translation.en: She felt her daughter was in danger.
translation.zh: 她觉得她的女儿会有危险

translation.en: I wasn't prepared for that.
translation.zh: 我完全没想到会这样

translation.en: In hindsight, I think I needed to go to Princeton to see for myself
translation.zh: 我事后回想 我去普林斯顿大学

translation.en: what was all this that I wasn't good enough for.
translation.zh: 是为了看看我到底欠缺在哪

translation.en: [Gayle] And then you're in class with some of these guys, and you realized what?
translation.zh: 然后你课上的一些人让你意识到了什么？

translation.en: Well, they're not that smart.
translation.zh: 他们没那么聪明

translation.en: And it's not even just an image that we have.
translation.zh: 我们的形象不是自己建立的

translation.en: It's an image that we're given.
translation.zh: 而是从小别人给我们的

translation.en: People have told us, "No, these are the things that aren't for you."
translation.zh: 别人跟我们说“你们不适合做这些事”

translation.en: So one of the most empowering things as a young person
translation.zh: 所以作为年轻人我们所能做的最赋权增能的事之一

translation.en: was to go to one of the top schools
translation.zh: 就是去到顶尖大学

translation.en: and realize that there are all kinds of affirmative action.
translation.zh: 但却发现那里有着各种不同的平权措施

translation.en: You know, there's legacy...
translation.zh: 优待校友的儿女或亲戚…

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -[Michelle] There's... -Yes.
translation.zh: -还有…-没错

translation.en: There's the college athlete.
translation.zh: 大学生运动员

translation.en: And universities have a right and an interest in diversifying.
translation.zh: 当然大学有权利与职责提倡多元化

translation.en: The problem is that when it comes to students of color, poor kids,
translation.zh: 但是一旦遇上肤色、贫困生的问题

translation.en: all of a sudden, that's affirmative action,
translation.zh: 就变成了另一种平权措施

translation.en: and that's a problem.
translation.zh: 这就是问题所在

translation.en: -And they're lesser than, yes. -[Michelle] And they're lesser than.
translation.zh: -而且当时是更少有-当时是更少有

translation.en: And I have been at, probably, every powerful table there is in the world.
translation.zh: 我几乎到过世上每一个最有权威的桌子

translation.en: I've been at G-summits, I've been in castles and palaces,
translation.zh: 我去过世界峰会 去过城堡和宫殿

translation.en: in boardrooms and academic universities.
translation.zh: 董事会会议室和大学

translation.en: -And-- -[Gayle] Can I drop the microphone?
translation.zh: -而我…-我能扔麦吗？

translation.en: -[Michelle] I'm coming down from the... -[drops microphone]
translation.zh: 我从…

translation.en: [Gayle] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: You know,
translation.zh: 你知道的

translation.en: I am coming down from the mountaintop to tell every young person
translation.zh: 我从顶峰位置下来就是为了告诉每一个年轻人

translation.en: that is poor and working class,
translation.zh: 这就算你贫穷和身处工人阶级

translation.en: and has been told, regardless of the color of your skin,
translation.zh: 被别人说不管你肤色为何

translation.en: that you don't belong,
translation.zh: 都不属于这里

translation.en: don't listen to them.
translation.zh: 别听他们的

translation.en: They don't even know how they got at those seats.
translation.zh: 他们连自己怎么走到那一步的都不知道

translation.en: [Gayle] Yes, yes, yes.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: [Michelle] They don't know.
translation.zh: 他们一无所知

translation.en: [women] D...
translation.zh: 海…
豚…

translation.en: L-P-H-I-N-S!
translation.zh: 海豚

translation.en: [woman] Some of these young women that we selected for this activity today
translation.zh: 一些我们选中参加这次活动的女孩

translation.en: asked the question, "Why me?"
translation.zh: 问：“为什么选我？”

translation.en: "You chose me. Why?"
translation.zh: “你为什么选我？”

translation.en: -Well, why not? -[Michelle] That's interesting, yeah.
translation.zh: -为什么不选你？-非常有趣

translation.en: So, how many of you thought that? Like, "Why me?"
translation.zh: 所以你们有多少人那么想过“为什么是我？”

translation.en: [woman 2] There's girls who I feel, like, they are president of this club,
translation.zh: 我知道有女孩比如这个俱乐部的主席

translation.en: their ACT, SAT is this, this... Whatever, right?
translation.zh: 她们的大学入学考试、学术能力评估测试都很优秀 对吧？

translation.en: I just literally come to school,
translation.zh: 但我只是来上学

translation.en: I do whatever I have to do,
translation.zh: 做我需要做的事

translation.en: and then I stay for one club, and that's Latinos Unidos,
translation.zh: 然后我留下来参加一个俱乐部就是拉丁美洲俱乐部

translation.en: and then I leave, and then I go to work.
translation.zh: 然后离开去工作

translation.en: [Michelle] And why do you work?
translation.zh: 你为什么要去工作？

translation.en: [Elizabeth] My dad... He had an accident.
translation.zh: 我爸爸出了事故

translation.en: He doesn't work like he used to.
translation.zh: 没办法像以前一样工作了

translation.en: Helping him out in some way would make him feel good.
translation.zh: 如果我能帮他一点 会让他觉得好些

translation.en: And also because I have three little brothers,
translation.zh: 还有就是我有三个弟弟

translation.en: everything that I do is for them.
translation.zh: 我做的一切都是为了他们

translation.en: I go to work and I bring them food.
translation.zh: 去工作为他们挣口饭钱

translation.en: Like, everything--
translation.zh: 为他们努力

translation.en: And she wonders why she's here.
translation.zh: 她却还问说为什么选她

translation.en: That story,
translation.zh: 你刚才说的那些

translation.en: with all the highs and lows,
translation.zh: 跌宕起伏

translation.en: and what seems so ordinary,
translation.zh: 看似平凡的故事

translation.en: and what seems like nothing to you,
translation.zh: 这一切对你来说好像没什么

translation.en: is your power.
translation.zh: 这就是你的力量

translation.en: [Elizabeth] Oof!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Last day.
translation.zh: 最后一天了

translation.en: Chris.
translation.zh: 克里斯

translation.en: Over here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: Do you have your yearbook?
translation.zh: 你拿到年鉴了吗？

translation.en: I am a senior at Whitney Young here in the South Side of Chicago.
translation.zh: 我是芝加哥南部的惠特尼杨高中的学生

translation.en: And I am a Mexican girl.
translation.zh: 我来自墨西哥

translation.en: This is my last week of high school.
translation.zh: 这是我在高中的最后一周

translation.en: I remember the first year, I was like, "I want to transfer to a different school.
translation.zh: 我还记得我刚入学时我想的是：“我要转校

translation.en: I can't do this work."
translation.zh: 我跟不上这里”

translation.en: Just putting myself down.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己不够好

translation.en: -[girl] That's nice. -Yeah. Sorry.
translation.zh: -真好-对 抱歉

translation.en: What kept me motivated was
translation.zh: 一直激励我的是

translation.en: here you get to be friends with people
translation.zh: 在这里 你能和与自己

translation.en: that are completely different from you,
translation.zh: 完全不同的人交朋友

translation.en: from different parts of the world,
translation.zh: 他们来自世界各地

translation.en: and I'm very thankful for that.
translation.zh: 我真的非常感激

translation.en: Girl, you always cry!
translation.zh: 姑娘 你总是会哭

translation.en: Knowing that I'm one of the first ones to graduate high school
translation.zh: 我作为我家第一个从高中毕业的人

translation.en: is just very important for my family and I.
translation.zh: 对我和我家人都意义重大

translation.en: [announcer] Elizabeth Cervantes.
translation.zh: 伊丽莎白瑟凡提斯

translation.en: [Elizabeth] I'm very excited about what the future holds
translation.zh: 我对未来充满期待

translation.en: and going to college.
translation.zh: 对大学满怀憧憬

translation.en: It's a huge accomplishment for me.
translation.zh: 这对我来说是巨大的成就

translation.en: [woman] When you come out, you'll say, "Hello, Washington DC."
translation.zh: 你出场后说：“你好 华府”

translation.en: You know, however you would want to maybe identify yourself.
translation.zh: 你要自我介绍一下

translation.en: "I worked with the Obamas. I've been an advisor for the Obamas for years.
translation.zh: 你可以说：“我跟奥巴马夫妻共事在他们身边做了好几年顾问

translation.en: I'm Valerie Jarrett, your host tonight."
translation.zh: 我叫瓦莱丽贾勒特是今晚的主持人”

translation.en: Just do a little establishing.
translation.zh: 就简单介绍一下自己

translation.en: -[Valerie] OK, I can do that. -Cool.
translation.zh: -好 我会的-很好

translation.en: And then she comes up here. You are in this chair.
translation.zh: 然后她走到这里 你坐这张椅子

translation.en: She's in that chair.
translation.zh: 她坐那张

translation.en: And so you guys can hug, wave, sit...
translation.zh: 你们可以拥抱、握手、坐下…

translation.en: converse.
translation.zh: 开始谈话

translation.en: And now, ladies and gentlemen, please welcome Michelle Obama!
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们热烈欢迎米歇尔奥巴马

translation.en: -[Valerie] Hey. -Let's go.
translation.zh: （创造世界应有的样貌）

translation.en: [Michelle] I was in my twenties.
translation.zh: 我当时20多岁

translation.en: I was a lawyer.
translation.zh: 是个律师

translation.en: And up until that point,
translation.zh: 直到那时

translation.en: I had been what I describe in the book as a "box-checker."
translation.zh: 我都只是一个照本操课的人正如我在书里描述的那样

translation.en: I was doing what I thought I was supposed to do.
translation.zh: 我做我认为自己该做的事

translation.en: You know, I was an A-student. I got the star.
translation.zh: 你看 我是个成绩优异非常出色的学生

translation.en: And that landed me from Princeton to Harvard,
translation.zh: 这使我成功从普林斯顿升入哈佛

translation.en: to a firm,
translation.zh: 然后到事务所工作

translation.en: without really thinking about what I cared about.
translation.zh: 我都没真正想过我想要什么

translation.en: [Valerie] You start practicing law,
translation.zh: 你开始从事法律行业

translation.en: and then, out of nowhere,
translation.zh: 然后突然之间

translation.en: comes a young man with a very peculiar name.
translation.zh: 出现了一个名字非同寻常的年轻男人

translation.en: And you were supposed to be his mentor.
translation.zh: 你本该是他的导师

translation.en: [Michelle] And then I had to call him on the phone.
translation.zh: 我不得不给他打电话

translation.en: This is when I first had a hint that there might be a little something more there.
translation.zh: 就是那时我开始觉得事情有不同寻常之处

translation.en: He's like, "Hello?"
translation.zh: 他说：“你好”

translation.en: And he's got that Barack Obama voice
translation.zh: 用的那种贝拉克奥巴马特有的声线

translation.en: that did not match the nerdy image I had in my head.
translation.zh: 这跟我想象的书呆子形象大相径庭

translation.en: And I was sort of like, "Whoa!"
translation.zh: 我当时有点惊讶

translation.en: I really was like, "Whoa!"
translation.zh: 真的毫无夸张

translation.en: The heat was coming out of the phone from that voice.
translation.zh: 被他从话筒里传出的热度击中

translation.en: But then he was late,
translation.zh: 但是他迟到了

translation.en: and I was like, "Trifling black man, late on the first day."
translation.zh: 我当时心想：“这个不起眼的黑人居然在第一天迟到”

translation.en: He flashed that smile.
translation.zh: 然后他露出那种笑容

translation.en: He was like, "Oh, I'm so sorry."
translation.zh: 说：“真的很抱歉

translation.en: [in deep voice] "I was... I was late.
translation.zh: 我迟到了

translation.en: I wasn't equipped with an umbrella."
translation.zh: 因为我没带伞”

translation.en: You know, and I started going, "OK."
translation.zh: 你们懂的 我就放过他了

translation.en: And he was walking by.
translation.zh: 之后每次他经过时

translation.en: All the secretaries were looking at me, like...
translation.zh: 所有的秘书都会看我 示意我…

translation.en: And I was like, "I know. I know, girl."
translation.zh: 我说：“我知道 姑娘们”

translation.en: Get him in the office.
translation.zh: 把他弄进办公室

translation.en: Yeah, it's fun listening to her tell these stories.
translation.zh: 听她讲那些事确实很有趣

translation.en: -[man] Yeah. -[Barack] Some of which, you know...
translation.zh: -是的-但有些时候…

translation.en: Part of me is like, "No.
translation.zh: 我的反应是：“不对

translation.en: Hold on a second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait. That's not exactly how it happened."
translation.zh: 事情才不是那样的”

translation.en: [Michelle] But because he was my advisee, I was like,
translation.zh: 但因为我得指导他 所以我说

translation.en: "Yeah, no, we're not dating."
translation.zh: “不 我们不能交往”

translation.en: Because he asked me out probably a month in,
translation.zh: 因为大概一个月后 他开始约我出去

translation.en: and I was like, "Dude, that would be so tacky."
translation.zh: 我说：“伙计 这真是太俗气了”

translation.en: The two black people from Harvard, you know?
translation.zh: 两个哈佛出来的黑人 你懂吗？

translation.en: I was like, "That's what they're waiting for."
translation.zh: 完全就是剧本走向

translation.en: It's like, "You guys love each other, don't you?
translation.zh: 他们会问：“你们是互相喜欢的吧？

translation.en: You're black, he's black. This will be great."
translation.zh: 你是黑人 他也是黑人你们是完美的一对”

translation.en: I was not gonna fall into that stereotype.
translation.zh: 我才不会跌入那种固有偏见之中

translation.en: But how do you fall for a guy who's driving a yellow Datsun?
translation.zh: 但你要怎么爱上个开黄色达特桑的…

translation.en: Yellow,
translation.zh: 黄色的

translation.en: with a hole in the floor, that when you're driving,
translation.zh: 就那种车底有个洞然后你开车的时候

translation.en: you can see the street as you're moving.
