translation.en: I mean, this was love, y'all.
translation.zh: 我想说 这就是爱 各位

translation.en: [Gayle] One day, you guys are hanging out in the middle of the night,
translation.zh: 有一天你们半夜出去约会

translation.en: and you see him staring off into space, and you're thinking,
translation.zh: 你看到他盯着天空 你想

translation.en: "I wonder if he's thinking about moi?"
translation.zh: “他会不会是在想着我？”

translation.en: And you said, "What are you thinking about?"
translation.zh: 然后你问：“你在想什么？”

translation.en: It could be, like, income inequality or...
translation.zh: 可能是收入不平等或…

translation.en: the fate of the black community.
translation.zh: 黑人社会的命运

translation.en: I was like, "Oh, how romantic."
translation.zh: 我想：“真浪漫”

translation.en: [Gayle] He was a different kind of dude from the very beginning.
translation.zh: 他从一开始就与众不同

translation.en: He was very different.
translation.zh: 他非常与众不同

translation.en: And he was different from me,
translation.zh: 也与我截然不同

translation.en: and he challenged me in different ways.
translation.zh: 他在很多方面都挑战了我

translation.en: I knew he was a tsunami coming after me,
translation.zh: 我知道他是席卷而来的海啸

translation.en: and if I didn't get my act together,
translation.zh: 如果我不提升自己

translation.en: I would be swept up.
translation.zh: 就会被他吞噬

translation.en: I didn't want to just be an appendage to his dreams.
translation.zh: 我不想只是他梦想的附属品

translation.en: So that forced me to work and think,
translation.zh: 所以这迫使我工作、思考

translation.en: and make decisions like leaving law.
translation.zh: 做出决定 比如离开法律界

translation.en: [Valerie] Well, speaking of your husband...
translation.zh: 说起你的丈夫…

translation.en: Wait, this is like when Jay-Z comes out
translation.zh: 等下 这就像是Jay-Z

translation.en: during the Beyoncé concert.
translation.zh: 在碧昂斯演唱会上出现一样

translation.en: You know, that's in "Crazy in Love." It's the same thing.
translation.zh: 这是《疯狂的爱》里的歌词完全是现在的写照

translation.en: It's just a little sample...
translation.zh: 就是一点调味剂

translation.en: to enhance...
translation.zh: 调动演唱会现场

translation.en: the concert.
translation.zh: 的气氛

translation.en: There are a couple of things I would correct.
translation.zh: 但我有几点想要更正

translation.en: You don't have to do that here.
translation.zh: 你不用在这里说

translation.en: -It's my book. -But that's my point.
translation.zh: -这是我的书-但这是我的观点

translation.en: -It's my book, my version of reality. -And we have to drive home together.
translation.zh: -是我的书 我眼中的现实情况-但我们一会要一起开车回家

translation.en: [Michelle] My relationship with Barack was all about our partnership.
translation.zh: 我跟贝拉克的关系就是我们的爱人关系

translation.en: If I was gonna have an equal voice
translation.zh: 如果我想在这个固执己见的男人面前

translation.en: with this very opinionated man,
translation.zh: 平等对话

translation.en: I had to get myself up.
translation.zh: 就必须打起精神

translation.en: I had to set myself off
translation.zh: 把自己放置在

translation.en: to a place where I was confident that I was going to be his equal.
translation.zh: 我有信心能与他平等的地方

translation.en: The thing that really changed it was the birth of our children.
translation.zh: 事情的转折点是我们孩子的出生

translation.en: I wasn't really ready for that.
translation.zh: 我其实并没有准备好

translation.en: That really made it harder.
translation.zh: 所以孩子的出生让一切更艰难了

translation.en: Something had to give,
translation.zh: 我们必须有所牺牲

translation.en: and it was my aspirations and dreams.
translation.zh: 所以我牺牲了我的抱负和梦想

translation.en: I made that concession,
translation.zh: 我做出那样的妥协

translation.en: not because he said, "You have to quit your job,"
translation.zh: 不是因为他说：“你要辞职”

translation.en: but it felt like, "I can't do all of this.
translation.zh: 而是我觉得我没办法什么都做

translation.en: So I have to tone down my aspirations.
translation.zh: 我得放下抱负

translation.en: I have to dial it back."
translation.zh: 回到起点

translation.en: [Gayle] You shared that you went to marital counseling,
translation.zh: 你曾说你去婚姻咨询了

translation.en: which I think is so important.
translation.zh: 我认为这点非常重要

translation.en: [Michelle] Counseling helped me to look at,
translation.zh: 婚姻咨询帮我思考

translation.en: "How do I take control of my own happiness within our marriage?"
translation.zh: 如何掌控自己婚姻的幸福

translation.en: But it's hard. It's hard.
translation.zh: 但这很难…

translation.en: -It is hard blending two lives together. -[Gayle] Yeah.
translation.zh: -将两个生命融合在一起非常困难-是的

translation.en: Did the marital counseling help?
translation.zh: 婚姻咨询对你有帮助吗？

translation.en: I went to five marriage counselors. It didn't help me.
translation.zh: 我去过五个婚姻咨询 但没一个有用

translation.en: What was the name of yours?
translation.zh: 你去的那家叫什么？

translation.en: I should have gone to your guy.
translation.zh: 我应该去你那家

translation.en: That's what I should have done.
translation.zh: 那才是我该做的

translation.en: So, did it help?
translation.zh: 所以有用吗？

translation.en: Because, you know, you think...
translation.zh: 因为你觉得…

translation.en: You go to marital counseling and you think that they're gonna tell you,
translation.zh: 你去婚姻咨询 他们会跟你说

translation.en: "He's right," or "You're right," or, "You're wrong."
translation.zh: “他对” 、“你对”或“你是错的”

translation.en: -And in my view-- -[Gayle] That's frustrating.
translation.zh: -我觉得…-真的让人觉得糟糕

translation.en: I took Barack to marital counseling
translation.zh: 我把贝拉克带去了婚姻咨询

translation.en: so that they fix him.
translation.zh: 让他们矫正他

translation.en: [Gayle] Yes.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: And then he started looking over at me. I was like, "Why are you talking to me?"
translation.zh: 然后婚姻咨询看向我我问：“你跟我说干吗？”

translation.en: "I am perfect.
translation.zh: 我很完美

translation.en: He is the problem."
translation.zh: 他才是有问题的那个

translation.en: But one of the things I learned that helped me,
translation.zh: 但我学到的让我受益匪浅

translation.en: and I think helped our marriage,
translation.zh: 也是对我们婚姻有所帮助的事

translation.en: was that my happiness is not dependent on him making me happy.
translation.zh: 就是我的幸福不是靠他给我的

translation.en: -Yes. Bravo, yes. -[audience applauding]
translation.zh: 没错 非常棒

translation.en: And sometimes I felt that that was one of the rubs.
translation.zh: 有时我会觉得那是我们之间主要的问题

translation.en: My resentment for him was that Barack was prioritizing himself, in a way.
translation.zh: 我总怨他优先考虑自己

translation.en: We had babies; he was at the gym.
translation.zh: 我们都有孩子了 但他却泡在健身房

translation.en: I was like, "How do you find time to work out?"
translation.zh: 我会好奇“你都是怎么找到时间去健身的？”

translation.en: [Gayle] Yeah. Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: 对…

translation.en: "So let me stop being mad at him for going to the gym
translation.zh: 所以我选择不再抱怨他去健身房

translation.en: -and let me get to the gym," you know? -[Gayle] Yes.
translation.zh: 反之我自己也开始去健身房

translation.en: [Michelle] Did it feel like a show that you would want to see?
translation.zh: 这是你会想看的演出吗？

translation.en: [Barack] Yeah. You're just a good storyteller.
translation.zh: 是的 你是个非常棒的故事叙述者

translation.en: Thank you, guys.
translation.zh: -好 谢谢各位-今晚真的很棒 谢谢

translation.en: [woman] Thank you. It was amazing tonight. Thank you.
translation.zh: -好 谢谢各位-今晚真的很棒 谢谢 谢谢

translation.en: -[Barack] Thank you, guys. -[woman 2] Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你们-谢谢

translation.en: -[Barack] Thank you. -[woman 3] Take it easy.
translation.zh: -谢谢-再见

translation.en: -[Michelle and Barack] Thank you. -[Barack] Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢

translation.en: [Michelle] Good afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: Can you all...? Oops. Sorry.
translation.zh: 你们能…抱歉

translation.en: Good afternoon!
translation.zh: 下午好！

translation.en: [crowd] Good afternoon!
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: [Michelle] This is the Obamas.
translation.zh: 我们是奥巴马一家

translation.en: This guy you'll hear from later, Barack.
translation.zh: 这位一会要演说的人叫贝拉克

translation.en: Sasha, better known as "Natasha," and Malia.
translation.zh: 她叫萨沙 也叫娜塔莎 她叫玛利亚

translation.en: And I am Michelle Obama.
translation.zh: 而我叫米歇尔奥巴马

translation.en: -I'm married to this guy. -[cheering]
translation.zh: 我嫁给了这个男人

translation.en: [Barack] She is fantastic.
translation.zh: 她非常优秀

translation.en: She really is.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: -[man] Done. Thank you. -[Melissa] Michelle, you ready?
translation.zh: 好了 谢谢 米歇尔 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Uh, not today. -OK.
translation.zh: （艾奥瓦州 印第安诺拉市公共图书馆） -还没有-好吧

translation.en: [Melissa] There was something about Michelle Obama.
translation.zh: 米歇尔奥巴马非常出色

translation.en: I quit a job that I had been in for ten years
translation.zh: 我辞掉了我从事了十年的工作

translation.en: to go work for her.
translation.zh: 去为她工作

translation.en: As a friend, I have been by her side for almost all of this.
translation.zh: 我作为朋友陪她一起经历了一路艰辛曲折

translation.en: See, some beats are just good.
translation.zh: 你看 就该来点音乐

translation.en: Oh, good Lord.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Do you know Melissa loves Barry Manilow?
translation.zh: 你知道莫里莎喜欢巴瑞曼尼洛吗？

translation.en: And I don't even know why we're friends.
translation.zh: 我都不知道我们怎么变成朋友的

translation.en: We couldn't be more opposite.
translation.zh: 我们简直就是相反的人

translation.en: That's why we're friends.
translation.zh: 所以我们才能成为朋友啊

translation.en: Having watched her begin this journey being so nervous,
translation.zh: （新罕布什尔州 伦敦德里） 她从一开始真的非常紧张

translation.en: you know, she wasn't crazy about the process.
translation.zh: 她真的对这一切完全不热衷

translation.en: She doesn't like politics,
translation.zh: 她不喜欢政治

translation.en: and here we were, dragging her around Iowa.
translation.zh: 但我们却拽着她走遍了艾奥瓦州

translation.en: For the first year of the campaign, it was exhausting and not glamorous,
translation.zh: 竞选开始第一年非常辛苦毫无乐趣可言

translation.en: and we ate...
translation.zh: 我们一直在吃…

translation.en: a lot of McDonald's.
translation.zh: 麦当劳

translation.en: And she'd lose her voice
translation.zh: 一整天下来

translation.en: by the end of the day,
translation.zh: 哑到没法子说话了

translation.en: because that's how hard we were working her; she was that valuable.
translation.zh: 因为我们交给她很多事 她非常重要

translation.en: She said to me, "I don't know if this country is ready
translation.zh: 她跟我说：“我不知道这个国家

translation.en: for someone like my husband.
translation.zh: 是否已准备好接受像我丈夫这样的人

translation.en: I hope they are, but they may not be."
translation.zh: 我希望他们准备好了但也可能事与愿违”

translation.en: [Gayle] Here you are on the campaign trail,
translation.zh: 你在竞选巡回演讲中

translation.en: and the way that you were vilified in the press,
translation.zh: 被媒体中伤

translation.en: the way you were misinterpreted in the press,
translation.zh: 误解

translation.en: really, was a horrible time
translation.zh: 那真的是一段非常可怕的时期

translation.en: that I think many of us really were not aware.
translation.zh: 但我想我们很多人并没有意识到这点

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Because I was going around the country doing big, huge rallies.
translation.zh: 因为我巡回了整个国家进行了非常大型的巡回演讲

translation.en: It was so much fun.
translation.zh: 我真的很享受整个过程

translation.en: [female announcer] Please join me in welcoming Michelle Obama
translation.zh: 请跟我一起欢迎民主党提名候选人奥巴马

translation.en: and the Democratic Party's nominee.
translation.zh: 以及他的夫人米歇尔

translation.en: [Michelle] But then the attacks started.
translation.zh: 但随之攻击声到来

translation.en: [female anchor] A fist bump? A pound?
translation.zh: 在台上击拳？

translation.en: A terrorist fist jab?
translation.zh: 这是恐怖分子的击拳吗？

translation.en: The gesture everyone seems to interpret differently.
translation.zh: 似乎每个人都对这个动作有不同的释意

translation.en: [Michelle] I was becoming effective in the campaign,
translation.zh: 我开始竞选中有影响力了

translation.en: so they went after me like they went after a candidate.
translation.zh: 所以他们像攻击候选人一样攻击我

translation.en: It blindsided me.
translation.zh: 我受到了沉重的打击

translation.en: [woman] One way people will try to defeat Obama
translation.zh: 他们想用这种方式击败奥巴马

translation.en: is if they can't prove he's a Muslim,
translation.zh: 就是如果无法证明奥巴马是穆斯林

translation.en: "Then let's prove his wife is an angry black woman."
translation.zh: 那就证明他老婆是个愤怒的黑人

translation.en: And I think it's gonna get ugly.
translation.zh: 我想事情会演变得很肮脏

translation.en: [male anchor] She's out on the campaign trail.
translation.zh: 她参与竞选集会

translation.en: She's making speeches on behalf of her husband.
translation.zh: 代丈夫发表演讲

translation.en: She's fair game.
translation.zh: 就会受到攻击

translation.en: [woman 2] One of her biggest hurdles will be defining herself
translation.zh: 她最大的困难就是在别人定义她前

translation.en: before anybody else does.
translation.zh: 定义她自己

translation.en: [Michelle] Over the course of the campaign,
translation.zh: 在整个竞选期间

translation.en: I was telling my story.
translation.zh: 我一直在诉说自己的故事

translation.en: I was being vulnerable.
translation.zh: 我非常容易被伤害

translation.en: Let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你们一些事

translation.en: For the first time in my adult lifetime,
translation.zh: 这是我成年之后第一次

translation.en: I'm really proud of my country.
translation.zh: 为自己的国家自豪

translation.en: And not just because Barack has done well,
translation.zh: 而这并不只是因为贝拉克做得很好

translation.en: but because I think people are hungry for change.
translation.zh: 更多的是因为人们在渴求改变

translation.en: And to have that distorted,
translation.zh: 但却有人曲解我的话

translation.en: it just felt so wrong.
translation.zh: 让我觉得非常难过

translation.en: Does Michelle Obama dislike America?
translation.zh: 米歇尔奥巴马讨厌美国吗？

translation.en: [man] I think that she's got a chip on her shoulder.
translation.zh: 我认为她对美国是有怀恨在心的

translation.en: [man 2] She's got this Stokely Carmichael in a designer dress thing going.
translation.zh: 她身着时装礼裙高声阔论像个民权运动领袖

translation.en: Her instinct is to start
translation.zh: 她直觉地

translation.en: with this, "Blame America," you know, "I'm the victim."
translation.zh: 责备美国 把自己塑造成受害者

translation.en: [woman] Speaking her mind can get her in trouble.
translation.zh: 袒露心声只会给她带来麻烦

translation.en: -[man 3] She looks like an angry woman. -[woman 2] She's not warm and fuzzy.
translation.zh: 她就是个愤怒的女人 她一点都不和蔼大方

translation.en: [man 4] She's adding fuel to the fire.
translation.zh: 她完全就是在火上浇油

translation.en: [woman 3] Michelle must think about what she's become in her life.
translation.zh: 米歇尔必须认真思考她的所作所为

translation.en: [Michelle] I stopped talking off-the-cuff.
translation.zh: 我开始不再即兴演讲

translation.en: I stopped talking freely.
translation.zh: 不再随性发表演说

translation.en: I used teleprompters.
translation.zh: 转而开始用提词器

translation.en: I had to be much more scripted
translation.zh: 我不得不尽量完全照讲稿演说

translation.en: than I had ever been before.
translation.zh: 这是我之前不常做的

translation.en: I was just sort of waking up to the...
translation.zh: 我开始逐渐意识到…

translation.en: the truth of who we can be:
translation.zh: 我们可能成为什么

translation.en: so ready to assume the worst in people.
translation.zh: 要对人性最险恶的一面做好心理准备

translation.en: The only thing I can do is share that that does hurt.
translation.zh: 我能做的就只有说出自己受伤的心情

translation.en: Because if we walk around pretending like it doesn't hurt,
translation.zh: 因为如果我们假装没事

translation.en: the perpetrator would just say, "Oh, I was just joking.
translation.zh: 那些始作俑者就会说“我只是开玩笑的

translation.en: It's just politics."
translation.zh: 政治就是这样”

translation.en: It's, like, "No, no. No, no.
translation.zh: 但不是的

translation.en: That changes the shape of a person's soul."
translation.zh: 那些所作所为的伤害会直达人的灵魂

translation.en: [Michelle] It's important to have a place that you know as your home.
translation.zh: 拥有一个你认为是家的地方很重要

translation.en: One place where people know you, they've seen you grow up,
translation.zh: 一个人们认识你 见证你成长

translation.en: where people don't have to make up a story about who you are.
translation.zh: 你无需编故事让别人认识你的地方

translation.en: It's what keeps me grounded.
translation.zh: 是这样一个家让我保持平衡与理性

translation.en: And this tree has been here forever.
translation.zh: 那棵树一直都在那里

translation.en: This was the tree where I had one of my first kisses.
translation.zh: 我就是在那棵树下接了第一个吻

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 可以了

translation.en: She always played everything over and over and over again.
translation.zh: 她总是一遍又一遍地弹每一首曲子

translation.en: It had to be perfect.
translation.zh: 非要弹到完美为止

translation.en: -The bulb is burned out. -[Michelle] OK.
translation.zh: -灯泡爆了-好的

translation.en: [Marian] You can tell it's stale in here.
translation.zh: 你能感觉到这里很阴暗

translation.en: This was the living room.
translation.zh: 这里是客厅

translation.en: And this is the...
translation.zh: 这个是…

translation.en: the radiator that Mom turned into a chimney for Christmas.
translation.zh: 曾被我妈改造成圣诞烟囱的散热器

translation.en: And there used to be mirrors on this wall to make this look bigger.
translation.zh: 这里原来是镜子用来让这里看起来更宽敞

translation.en: I was a teenager here,
translation.zh: 我住在这里时是青少年

translation.en: and Barack and I lived here for a year together.
translation.zh: 贝拉克和我在这里一起住了一年

translation.en: But this is my dad's chair.
translation.zh: 这是我爸的椅子

translation.en: He always had some version of this recliner,
translation.zh: 他总是要有这种躺椅

translation.en: where he would sit and hold court.
translation.zh: 他会坐在这里和接待客人

translation.en: And when we all lived here,
translation.zh: 我们都还住在这里的时候

translation.en: his stereo system would be lined up there
translation.zh: 他的立体声响系统摆满了那一排

translation.en: with his speakers and all of his jazz albums.
translation.zh: 和他的音响和爵士乐专辑一起

translation.en: And the couch was kind of that way.
translation.zh: 沙发是那样摆的

translation.en: And he would sit for hours just playing.
translation.zh: 他会在这里一坐几小时 听音乐

translation.en: He would get into his mood where he would just want to hear his jazz.
translation.zh: 然后沉浸其中 一直听爵士乐

translation.en: You know, he fills up this space.
translation.zh: 他填满了这整个空间

translation.en: I think about all that we did,
translation.zh: 我会想我们做的一切

translation.en: and I think about my husband, and...
translation.zh: 想我的丈夫…

translation.en: I always think about him coming home from work, coming up those stairs.
translation.zh: 想象他下班回到家 走上楼梯

translation.en: But him coming up those stairs was like God returning home.
translation.zh: 但他走上楼梯的时候就散发出一种上帝回家的感觉

translation.en: My father had MS.
translation.zh: 我爸患有多发性硬化病

translation.en: It's a disease that slowly deteriorates the body.
translation.zh: 这是一种会让人的身体逐渐恶化的病

translation.en: I can't help but think of that time right before his death
translation.zh: 我总是会想到他去世前那段时间

translation.en: when he struggled to get out that back door just to get to work,
translation.zh: 他挣扎着想出门上班的样子

translation.en: not giving up, not in the least.
translation.zh: 他到最后一刻都没放弃

translation.en: While his death was sudden,
translation.zh: 他的死非常突然

translation.en: it was always looming.
translation.zh: 对我们造成了沉重的打击

translation.en: The pain of losing him is an emptiness I still haven't gotten over.
translation.zh: 我至今依旧没有摆脱失去他的痛苦

translation.en: I think about all that he gave us,
translation.zh: 我不禁想起他给我们的一切

translation.en: and all that he wasn't able to see.
translation.zh: 和他无法看到的一切

translation.en: He had a way of making people that he was with
translation.zh: 他总是有办法让在他身边的人

translation.en: feel his presence. Um...
translation.zh: 感受到他的力量

translation.en: He just made people feel loved.
translation.zh: 他能让人感到被爱

translation.en: [girl] My grandma's from Thailand.
translation.zh: 我奶奶来自泰国

translation.en: A lot of the culture in the house is kind of influenced by her.
translation.zh: 我家的很多文化都有点受她影响

translation.en: And when I was, like, five years old, I got this little pencil skirt
translation.zh: 我大概在五岁的时候穿过一条那种铅笔裙

translation.en: and off-the-shoulder top.
translation.zh: 在肩上披一条围巾的那种

translation.en: [Michelle] Yeah. That's why I tell people we focus too much on stats and not story.
translation.zh: 对 我跟别人说我们太关注数据却忽视了故事

translation.en: Stats are, like, "What college are you from?"
translation.zh: 数据只会问你“你毕业于那个大学？”

translation.en: But your story is, like,
translation.zh: 但你的故事就会问

translation.en: "What was your grandfather like?"
translation.zh: “你爷爷是怎么样的人？”

translation.en: "Who was your favorite relative and why?"
translation.zh: “你最喜欢哪个亲戚？为什么？”

translation.en: What advice would you give to someone
translation.zh: 你会给那些想避免变成数据的人

translation.en: who's trying to avoid just becoming a stat?
translation.zh: 什么建议？

translation.en: Like, when you go to college you're not just the kid with the 3.0 GPA,
translation.zh: 比如你上大学的时候 不止是个平均学分绩点是三的人

translation.en: or when you're applying for jobs,
translation.zh: 或当你找工作时

translation.en: you're not just that person who graduated top of her class.
translation.zh: 不止是班级的尖子毕业生

translation.en: How do you avoid just becoming a number?
translation.zh: 你会如何避免只是成为一个数字？

translation.en: [Michelle] I think what makes you more than a stat is once you see yourself,
translation.zh: 我认为要想自己不止是个数字就只有当你自己…

translation.en: you see yourself as more than a stat,
translation.zh: 当你自己不把自己看作一个数字时才行

translation.en: and you start thinking about, "Who are you?
translation.zh: 你要问自己：“我是谁？

translation.en: What do you care about? What brings you joy?"
translation.zh: 我在乎什么？什么让我快乐？”

translation.en: And I hope my story urges you to see the power of your story
translation.zh: 我希望我的故事能敦促你看到自己故事的力量

translation.en: and to own that.
translation.zh: 然后拥有那力量

translation.en: [Shayla] Now that I'm going into my senior year,
translation.zh: 我升入了毕业季

translation.en: I'm thinking about how to make sure you're doing the right things.
translation.zh: 我在想如何才能确定自己在做对的事

translation.en: So reading Michelle Obama's book,
translation.zh: 通过阅读米歇尔奥巴马的书

translation.en: we see that she just slowly started to assert herself,
translation.zh: 我们看到她渐渐开始肯定她自己

translation.en: and all those insecurities just become, like...
translation.zh: 她所有的不安…

translation.en: small voices.
translation.zh: 都渐渐淡化

translation.en: [Shayla] Reading about how her family works...
translation.zh: 读到她家人的相处方式后

translation.en: ...I was like, "Wow.
translation.zh: 我非常吃惊

translation.en: Wow."
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: That's our family.
translation.zh: 这不就是我家吗？

translation.en: [Shayla] In the morning time, we dance through our morning routine.
translation.zh: 早上 我们会一边跳舞一边准备

translation.en: We'll just dance through the hallways.
translation.zh: 在走廊上起舞

translation.en: [woman] If they're up, pleasant and having a good morning,
translation.zh: 如果他们起来后展开新的一天

translation.en: we're playing some music, you're kind of in good spirits, so...
translation.zh: 我们会放音乐 让心情越来越好

translation.en: It helps everybody shake off the cobwebs.
translation.zh: 这可以让我们精神抖擞

translation.en: Yesterday's mistake... It's a new day.
translation.zh: 昨天的错误就让它过去今天是崭新的一天

translation.en: I do like these curls. Turn, please.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢这些卷 转过来

translation.en: [Shayla] The sacrifices my mom would make makes me think, like,
translation.zh: 我妈妈做出的牺牲让我坚定信念

translation.en: "All right, just strive to do what you can,
translation.zh: 拼尽全力做自己能做的

translation.en: and just be prepared for whatever life throws at you."
translation.zh: 为生活中所有的可能做好准备

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you, too. Have a good day.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你 祝你今天愉快

translation.en: [Shayla] I want to be successful, and I also want to impact somebody.
translation.zh: 我想成功 我也想影响他人

translation.en: [female moderator] America opened itself up to you
translation.zh: -美国对你们展开了双臂…-对

translation.en: with that historic election.
translation.zh: 那场历史大选改变了时代

translation.en: And I think everybody in this room will remember where they were
translation.zh: 我想这里在场每个人都记得

translation.en: on that November evening in 2008.
translation.zh: 2008年11月中的那晚他们在哪

translation.en: [Michelle] From the minute that the announcement happened,
translation.zh: 结果宣布那一瞬间

translation.en: the world changed for us.
translation.zh: 世界为我们改变

translation.en: People came in with briefing books,
translation.zh: 人们开始拿着简报书进来

translation.en: and world leaders were calling, right then and there.
translation.zh: 立即有世界领导人打电话来

translation.en: So we had to leave the hotel to go to the campaign event,
translation.zh: 所以我们不得不离开宾馆去竞选现场

translation.en: and everything is shut down
translation.zh: 当总统车队开在路上时

translation.en: when the presidential motorcade comes down.
translation.zh: 所有一切都关闭了

translation.en: Streets are clean. Nothing is going on.
translation.zh: 街上空无一人 一切都安安静静

translation.en: So it's just us in the motorcade,
translation.zh: 整条街只有坐在车队里的我们

translation.en: and Malia's like...
translation.zh: 然后玛利亚说

translation.en: "No one's coming to your party, Dad."
translation.zh: “没人来参加你的派对 爸爸”

translation.en: That's what she was saying.
translation.zh: 她那么说

translation.en: And she was like, "Oh, I feel bad for you."
translation.zh: 她说：“爸 我真为你感到难过”

translation.en: I would not be standing here tonight
translation.zh: 若没有我最好的朋友在过去16年里

translation.en: without the unyielding support
translation.zh: 对我无私的支持

translation.en: of my best friend for the last 16 years,
translation.zh: 我今夜就无法站在这里

translation.en: the rock of our family,
translation.zh: 她是我们家的支柱

translation.en: the love of my life,
translation.zh: 我的今生挚爱

translation.en: the nation's next First Lady,
translation.zh: 美国的下任第一夫人

translation.en: Michelle Obama.
translation.zh: 米歇尔奥巴马

translation.en: [all chant] Yes, we can! Yes, we can!
translation.zh: 是的 我们可以…

translation.en: [bodyguard] We'll take a look first and come back.
translation.zh: 我们先去看一下就回来

translation.en: [bodyguard 2] Good afternoon.
translation.zh: 下午好

translation.en: We're going to be leaving the RON to go to the O2 Arena for this evening's event,
translation.zh: 我们要离开RON去O2体育馆参加今晚的活动了

translation.en: which, right now, It was at 93%
translation.zh: 目前现场满座程度为93%

translation.en: when we had our walkthroughs earlier, so approximately 15,000.
translation.zh: 根据我们之前的调查这有15000人左右

translation.en: -The venue holds 17,500, all right? -And now it's up to 98%.
translation.zh: -场地容量为17500人 对吗？-但现在已经达到98%了

translation.en: For those of you who have worked these before,
translation.zh: 对之前参与过类似任务的人

translation.en: it should be the same footprint, as far as the buildout and everything.
translation.zh: 应该遵照之前的位置包括场外和其他所有地方

translation.en: From her hold to the stage is 65 feet.
translation.zh: 她到舞台是20米的距离

translation.en: The stage is five feet tall. And there are the six stairs to the back.
translation.zh: 舞台高约1.5米 后面有六个台阶

translation.en: She goes through the hockey tunnel.
translation.zh: 她会经过那个过道

translation.en: -[Michelle] Everything OK, Allen? -[Allen] Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -一切都还好吗 艾伦？-是的 夫人

translation.en: One day, I've got to sit and see how the sausage is made.
translation.zh: 总有一天 我会静下来仔细研究一下

translation.en: Like, all the pre-stuff that goes into it, I'm just not a part of.
translation.zh: 我知道他们做的所有准备但并不了解具体过程

translation.en: You know? But I always ask questions. I always want to know where the guns are.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我总是不停地问问题总是想知道枪在哪

translation.en: Because what if somebody really was trying to take me out?
translation.zh: 因为万一真的有人想暗杀我

translation.en: They would take these two out first.
translation.zh: 他们就会先干掉他们俩

translation.en: I could get us to safety, Allen.
translation.zh: 我会保护我们的 艾伦

translation.en: You guys, I got you covered. I'm always thinking.
translation.zh: 两位 我会保护你们的我总是这么想

translation.en: [Allen] I know you could.
translation.zh: 我知道你可以的

translation.en: -I'm very confident in that. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 我们对你非常有信心

translation.en: [Michelle] Agent Allen.
translation.zh: 艾伦探员

translation.en: Allen is more like a brother than he is an agent.
translation.zh: 艾伦更像哥哥 而不是探员

translation.en: He was my first experience of having a detail,
translation.zh: 他是我的第一个…

translation.en: of being on a detail and having a detail leader.
translation.zh: 第一个保镖 也是第一个保镖队长

translation.en: So that's been... oof!
translation.zh: 所以这有…

translation.en: Well, that's 12 years of a relationship, if not more. Um...
translation.zh: 我们至少认识12年了

translation.en: And I've spent a lot of time looking at the back of his head.
translation.zh: 但大把时间里我只是盯着他的后脑勺

translation.en: [Allen] I've been working with Mrs. Obama since 2008.
translation.zh: 我从2008年开始就一直为奥巴马夫人工作

translation.en: You need to eat a little dinner.
translation.zh: 你应该吃点晚餐

translation.en: -It's not enough time. -We know.
translation.zh: -但是时间根本不够-我们知道

translation.en: [Allen] Over that time, if you're around a protectee,
translation.zh: 那时期 如果你跟在被保护对象身边

translation.en: you get to know each other very well.
translation.zh: 我们就会对互相非常了解

translation.en: I'll come back to you.
translation.zh: 我会回去找你的

translation.en: -I'm gonna win you over. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 我要去把你抢过来

translation.en: [Allen] The stakes are very high in this job.
translation.zh: 这份工作的赌注很大

translation.en: It's a no-fail mission,
translation.zh: 绝不容许失败

translation.en: so you have to get it right 100% of the time.
translation.zh: 所以你必须保证100%无失误

translation.en: We took a trip to the Great Wall in China.
translation.zh: 我们去中国长城旅行的时候

translation.en: It had been planned out that the girls would have the ability to take the slide down.
translation.zh: 按计划 姑娘们可以去这里溜滑梯

translation.en: And when Mrs. Obama saw the slide,
translation.zh: 奥巴马夫人看到滑梯后

translation.en: she became interested in wanting to do it as well.
translation.zh: 也很想去尝试

translation.en: As you can see, she's smiling and I'm not smiling.
translation.zh: 你可以看到照片里她在笑 但我没有

translation.en: But obviously it's a very special photo. It's a fun photo.
translation.zh: 但这真的是一张很特殊的照片非常有意思

translation.en: It's actually one of my favorites.
translation.zh: 是我最喜欢的照片之一

translation.en: And that's something I always have to pinch myself and say,
translation.zh: 有时候我会掐我自己 问自己

translation.en: "Did I really experience all of that?"
translation.zh: “那些真的都是我经历过的？”

translation.en: What did you think life in the White House
translation.zh: 你入住白宫前觉得

translation.en: was going to be like before you got in there?
translation.zh: 白宫里的生活会是怎么样的？

translation.en: Is there any way somebody coming into that house can know?
translation.zh: 有没有任何办法知道？

translation.en: Families who have the legacy of the White House have some idea.
translation.zh: 那些入住过白宫的家庭会知道

translation.en: I mean, the Bushes, their daughters were granddaughters in the White House.
translation.zh: 比如布什一家布什的孙女都是出生在白宫的

translation.en: We were not those people.
translation.zh: 但我们并不是他们

translation.en: I didn't know what the residence part of it looked like,
translation.zh: 我不知道住在总统府里是什么样子

translation.en: but I do know, when I went to visit and have tea with Laura Bush,
translation.zh: 但我去拜访白宫和劳拉布什喝茶的时候看到

translation.en: there were butlers there fully-dressed in tuxedos, which they wore all the time,
translation.zh: 桌边有管家他们一直身着无尾礼服

translation.en: most of them African-American or Latino older men.
translation.zh: 而且他们大部分都是非裔美国人或老一辈的拉丁裔美国人

translation.en: What I spent a lot of time thinking about is,
translation.zh: 而我当时一直考虑的是

translation.en: "How do I make this mansion with butlers and staff
translation.zh: “我如何让有这一屋子管家和员工的房子

translation.en: feel like a home for two little girls?"
translation.zh: 对我的两个孩子来说像个家？”

translation.en: Because first of all, I didn't want them to grow up thinking
translation.zh: 因为首先我不希望她们产生一种概念

translation.en: that grown African-American men served them in tuxedos.
translation.zh: 就是非裔美国人要穿无尾礼服服侍她们

translation.en: Because, you know, the truth was that some of those men were my uncles,
translation.zh: 因为他们有些可以看作是我的叔叔

translation.en: and they were the Pullman porters, and the folks...
translation.zh: 他们当年是铁路上的搬运工人和担任其他仆役的工作

translation.en: And I didn't want my girls to grow up with that image,
translation.zh: 我不希望我的孩子从小有这种概念

translation.en: so we had to change the dress code.
translation.zh: 所以我们改变了着装规定

translation.en: It was like, "You can't walk around every day in a full tuxedo," you know?
translation.zh: 让他们不要整天穿着无尾礼服

translation.en: Because the girls would have pool parties and play dates and little kids over.
translation.zh: 因为孩子们时不时会有朋友过来一起开泳池派对 玩耍

translation.en: And it's, like, that just doesn't even look right to me, you know? Um...
translation.zh: 那景象在我看来就是不太对

translation.en: And, you know, I had to beg the housekeepers.
translation.zh: 然后我还要拜托保洁员

translation.en: "These girls have to learn how to clean their own rooms
translation.zh: 让孩子们自己打扫自己的房间

translation.en: and make their beds, and do their laundry.
translation.zh: 自己铺床 自己洗衣服

translation.en: You cannot do this every day because they will not live here forever.
translation.zh: 他们不能每天都帮她们因为我们不会永远住在那里

translation.en: And I am not raising kids that don't know how to make a bed," you know?
translation.zh: 而我也不会把孩子培养成不会自己铺床的人

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: Of course the girls were like, "They make your bed."
translation.zh: 但是孩子们反驳我说“他们帮你铺床”

translation.en: And it's like, "Because I'm the First Lady
translation.zh: 我说：“因为我是第一夫人

translation.en: and I have a degree."
translation.zh: 还拿到了学位证书”

translation.en: [Michelle] As First Lady, I was slowly watching myself being exposed to the world.
translation.zh: 作为第一夫人 我看着自己一点点被暴露在世界中

translation.en: I had to become more strategic in how I presented myself,
translation.zh: 我必须在展现自己方面有更好的战略

translation.en: because it had the potential of defining me for the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 因为我的形象可能定义我一辈子

translation.en: Fashion for a woman
translation.zh: 时装

translation.en: still predominates how people view you,
translation.zh: 依旧主导着世人对女人的看法

translation.en: and that's not fair, that's not right, but it's true.
translation.zh: 这很不公平 也很不对 但这是事实

translation.en: And that's when fashion isn't just fashion;
translation.zh: 对于女人 时装不止是时装

translation.en: it's how you turn it into your tool, rather than being a victim of it.
translation.zh: 而是你成功的工具或伤害你的利器

translation.en: There is a lot of thought that Meredith Koop puts into it.
translation.zh: 梅雷迪思科普放了很多心思在我的造型上

translation.en: And I trust Meredith.
translation.zh: 我也很相信梅雷迪思

translation.en: She's like my sister,
translation.zh: 她就像我的妹妹

translation.en: daughter, friend, everything.
translation.zh: 女儿、朋友 或任何亲密的人

translation.en: [Meredith] People have these ideas of a First Lady look.
translation.zh: 人们对第一夫人有他们自己的主观印象

translation.en: You're dealing with these outside forces
translation.zh: 你面对的是这些外界压力

translation.en: saying things that don't match up with this woman.
translation.zh: 说一些不符合真实的她的话

translation.en: So I felt a lot of my work in the White House
translation.zh: 所以我觉得我在白宫的工作

translation.en: was more like costume design.
translation.zh: 更主要是形象设计

translation.en: Dressing her and her children for this role.
translation.zh: 为她和她的孩子搭配符合她们形象的服装

translation.en: And then it's about, "Let's move the conversation on to what she's doing
translation.zh: 让人们在注意到她着装的小细节的同时

translation.en: versus some little fashion detail."
translation.zh: 也注意到她的工作

translation.en: I'd make some impassioned speech and they would say,
translation.zh: 我做重要的演讲时观众会说

translation.en: "Oh, she was wearing an interesting designer dress."
translation.zh: “她穿的小礼裙挺有意思的”

translation.en: So a lot of it was, "OK, let's embrace the fact that people are looking at my shoes,
translation.zh: 我就想“他们要盯着我鞋子看就看吧

translation.en: not just highlight me and the clothes,
translation.zh: 只要他们在注意到我个人和着装之外

translation.en: but who we wanted to be as an administration:
translation.zh: 也看到我们在努力成为

translation.en: forward-thinking, embracing youth,
translation.zh: 积极乐观 看重年轻血液

translation.en: embracing diversity.
translation.zh: 注重多元化的政府就好”

translation.en: Now that we're out of the White House,
translation.zh: 如今我们离开了白宫

translation.en: not to be viewed, judged, and parceled by every other person on the planet,
translation.zh: 无需再被世界上的每一个人观察、评价和揣度

translation.en: um, yeah, it's better.
translation.zh: 对 这好多了

translation.en: [Michelle] It's absolutely freeing.
translation.zh: 我觉得自由多了

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: She is not a minimalist.
translation.zh: 她不是极简派主义者

translation.en: Like, she's not... Like, hello.
translation.zh: 她不会反感这类服装

translation.en: And, I mean, when I look at this suit, I do see Elvis,
translation.zh: 我看到这件西装时就想到了猫王埃尔维斯

translation.en: and I don't have a problem with that.
translation.zh: 我觉得这非常好

translation.en: [Michelle] I had to shake all that up.
translation.zh: 我必须改变很多

translation.en: But, yeah, it's hard to wake up every day
translation.zh: 但一个人确实很难做到每天醒来后

translation.en: and maintain that level of perfection
translation.zh: 都维持十全十美

translation.en: that was absolutely required of me and Barack
translation.zh: 但我和贝拉克作为第一任黑人总统和第一夫人

translation.en: as the first black president and First Lady.
translation.zh: 却被大众这样要求着

translation.en: -Thank you. -[man] Have a good night.
translation.zh: -谢谢-晚安

translation.en: [Michelle] All right. You too.
translation.zh: 好的 你也是

translation.en: [Michelle] Our presence in the White House had been celebrated by millions of Americans.
translation.zh: 我们入住白宫受到了上百万美国人的祝贺

translation.en: But others reacted with fear.
translation.zh: 但也有一部分人表现出了恐慌

translation.en: When Barack was first elected,
translation.zh: 当贝拉克第一次当选时

translation.en: various commentators had naively declared
translation.zh: 许多评论家天真地发表评论说

translation.en: that our country was entering "a post-racial era,"
translation.zh: 我们国家步入了“后种族时代”

translation.en: in which skin color would no longer matter.
translation.zh: 肤色将不再重要

translation.en: Many were overlooking the racism
translation.zh: 但他们许多人都忽视了种族歧视

translation.en: and tribalism that were tearing our nation apart.
translation.zh: 和种族隔离正在撕裂这个国家

translation.en: Barack and I lived with an awareness
translation.zh: 我的贝拉克都时刻警醒自己

translation.en: that we ourselves were a provocation.
translation.zh: 我们存在本身就是一种挑衅

translation.en: Michael Brown.
translation.zh: 迈克尔布朗

translation.en: Tamir Rice.
translation.zh: 塔米尔莱斯

translation.en: Freddie Gray.
translation.zh: 弗雷迪格雷

translation.en: Eric Garner.
translation.zh: 埃里克加纳

translation.en: Trayvon Martin.
translation.zh: 特雷翁马丁

translation.en: Sandra Bland.
translation.zh: 桑德拉布兰德

translation.en: When you see people gunned down
translation.zh: 当你看到有人就因为

translation.en: because somebody was so afraid of a kid in a hoodie
translation.zh: 害怕一个戴衣帽的孩子

translation.en: that that ended his life...
translation.zh: 而开枪杀死了他

translation.en: So how were these people dealing with the fact
translation.zh: 那么这些人会怎么看待

translation.en: that a black family was in what they perceived as their White House?
translation.zh: 这个住在他们认为是属于他们的白宫里的黑人家庭？

translation.en: That is the America that we live in.
translation.zh: 这就是我们生活的美国

translation.en: So if we're going to get anywhere with each other,
translation.zh: 所以如果我们想带大家一起前进

translation.en: we have to be willing to say who we are.
translation.zh: 就必须向大家展示真实的自己

translation.en: I am the former First Lady of the United States
translation.zh: 我是美国前任第一夫人

translation.en: and also a descendant of slaves.
translation.zh: 同时也是奴隶的后代

translation.en: It's important to keep that truth right there.
translation.zh: 我们必须铭记那段历史

translation.en: My grandfather's grandmother was in bondage.
translation.zh: 我爷爷的奶奶曾是奴隶

translation.en: People have been taught to believe in the ultimate inferiority of people
translation.zh: 人们被灌输不同肤色间的

translation.en: because of the color of their skin.
translation.zh: 高低之别

translation.en: [female anchor] A death threat against the president.
translation.zh: 总统受到死亡威胁

translation.en: [female anchor 2] DC police looking into an officer threatening Michelle Obama.
translation.zh: 华府警方正在调查一名官员威胁米歇尔奥巴马一案

translation.en: [female anchor 3] Gunshots near the White House.
translation.zh: 白宫附近发生枪击案

translation.en: [female anchor 4] Seven bullets hit the building.
translation.zh: 至少有七枚子弹射中白宫

translation.en: [Michelle] You hoped people were more ready for us...
translation.zh: 我们希望人们能比一开始…

translation.en: than maybe what they were.
translation.zh: 更能接受我们

translation.en: Barack and I had incredible highs
translation.zh: 贝拉克和我曾在一天内

translation.en: and incredible lows in one day.
translation.zh: 经历了感情的两极分化

translation.en: So, on the day that marriage equality became the law of the land,
translation.zh: 婚姻平等正式通过生效那天

translation.en: -it was a very powerful day. -[cheering and applause]
translation.zh: 是一个充满正能量的日子

translation.en: But until I wrote the book,
translation.zh: 但我直到写这本书时

translation.en: I forgot that that morning,
translation.zh: 才想起那天早晨

translation.en: we had attended the funeral
translation.zh: 我们参与了一场葬礼

translation.en: of men and women who were killed in Bible study in Charleston.
translation.zh: 就是死于在查尔斯顿的圣经研究会的人们的葬礼

translation.en: ♪ Amazing grace ♪
translation.zh: 奇异恩典

translation.en: ♪ How sweet the sound ♪
translation.zh: 何等甘甜

translation.en: [all] ♪ That saved ♪
translation.zh: 我罪

translation.en: ♪ A wretch ♪
translation.zh: 已得

translation.en: ♪ Like me ♪
translation.zh: 赦免

translation.en: [Michelle] So imagine coming back from that heavy experience, flying in.
translation.zh: 所以我们结束那段沉重的旅途坐飞机回来后

translation.en: And then we're at dinner,
translation.zh: 在晚餐期间

translation.en: and we hear the sounds of people gathering
translation.zh: 我们听到人们聚集在

translation.en: on Pennsylvania Avenue.
translation.zh: 宾夕法尼亚大道的声音

translation.en: [Michelle] And we had arranged in advance to have the White House lit up,
translation.zh: 我们也提前安排让白宫亮灯

translation.en: celebrating the passage of marriage equality.
translation.zh: 庆祝《婚姻平等法案》获得通过

translation.en: [Michelle] And we see this happening on TV, and I thought,
translation.zh: 我们在电视上看着这一切

translation.en: "We are living in this.
translation.zh: 不禁想：“我们就住在这里

translation.en: This is outside of our house. I don't want to watch it on TV.
translation.zh: 这一切就发生在我们房外我不想通过电视看

translation.en: I need to be a part of this celebration after today.
translation.zh: 在经历今天的事后我要加入他们一起庆祝

translation.en: I need to be reminded of how much progress we're making."
translation.zh: 我要提醒自己我们已经向前迈了一大步”

translation.en: But then I had to get out.
translation.zh: 但首先我得出去

translation.en: So I go to Malia and she's like, "OK, Mommy, I'm game. Let's do it."
translation.zh: 所以我去找玛利亚 她说“好 妈妈 我也想去 我们走吧”

translation.en: So you walk out your door. There's a Secret Service agent out there.
translation.zh: 然后我们走出了门外面站着一个保镖

translation.en: And I'm telling Malia, "Don't look him in the eye.
translation.zh: 我跟玛利亚说：“别直视他

translation.en: Don't say anything.
translation.zh: 什么都别说

translation.en: We're just gonna walk."
translation.zh: 一直往前走”

translation.en: So we get downstairs to that front door,
translation.zh: 然后我们下了楼走到了那扇前门那里

translation.en: um, and I go to open it, and it's locked.
translation.zh: 我想打开它 但是门是锁着的

translation.en: So I am literally shaking it,
translation.zh: 我非常用力地晃门

translation.en: and now more Service have been called,
translation.zh: 然后就来了更多保镖

translation.en: because they don't know what I'm trying to do.
translation.zh: 因为他们不知道我想干嘛

translation.en: "What is ma'am doing?"
translation.zh: “夫人在做什么？”

translation.en: "What is ma'am doing? Where is she going? She still hasn't told us anything."
translation.zh: “夫人在干吗？她要去哪？她怎么不告诉我们？”

translation.en: And nobody really wants to ask you,
translation.zh: 但他们也没人想来问

translation.en: because they're not supposed to ask where you're going.
translation.zh: 因为他们不能打听我的行程

translation.en: They're trying to pretend like you have freedom. So...
translation.zh: 他们要假装我们是自由的 所以…

translation.en: So I had to turn around and say, "I just want to get outside.
translation.zh: 所以我就转向他们说“我就是想出去

translation.en: Help me get outside.
translation.zh: 帮我开开门

translation.en: I want my daughter and I..."
translation.zh: 我想让我和我女儿…”

translation.en: So I'm just yelling, "Get me out of this house!"
translation.zh: 我几乎是大喊着说：“让我们出去”

translation.en: And she's like, "OK, I have an idea."
translation.zh: 她说：“好吧 我有个办法”

translation.en: And we ran around some back steps. We finally got outside.
translation.zh: 然后我们走了往后面的路终于来到了外面

translation.en: We were, like, off in a corner,
translation.zh: 我们在一个角落

translation.en: and we could just barely see the sides of the lights.
translation.zh: 刚好能看到一点点灯光

translation.en: But Malia and I were out.
translation.zh: 但我和玛利亚出去了

translation.en: And I hugged her tight.
translation.zh: 我紧紧地抱住她

translation.en: But that's sometimes how you feel, like,
translation.zh: 那就是人有时会有的感受

translation.en: "I've gotta... I have to have some indicator that all of this is worth it,
translation.zh: “我需要一些事来证明一切都值得

translation.en: that we are moving this country forward."
translation.zh: 我们在推动着国家前进”

translation.en: [whispers] Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -How are you all doing? -[woman] Hi.
translation.zh: -你们都好吗？-嗨

translation.en: [Michelle] Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Hey. -It's amazing to see you.
translation.zh: -嘿-真不敢相信能见到你

translation.en: How are you?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: What are you looking forward to in life? And what brings you down?
translation.zh: 你们对生活有什么期盼？什么会让你们失望？

translation.en: [man] It's just us reservation kids going through universities
translation.zh: 对于我们这些原住民学生来说

translation.en: in the era of Trump.
translation.zh: 在特朗普时代上大学

translation.en: I see Trump hats every day in classes,
translation.zh: 每天上课都能看到特朗普的帽子

translation.en: and it's just like an impact that you can't really describe.
translation.zh: 这是一种难以描述的冲击

translation.en: But it's just there, subconsciously, on a subconscious level.
translation.zh: 但它就在那里潜移默化地影响着我们

translation.en: If you could share any tips or recommendations?
translation.zh: 你能跟我们分享一些经验或建议吗？

translation.en: [Michelle] Yeah, I mean, I can't imagine how tough it must be for you all.
translation.zh: 对 我很难想象这对你们有多艰辛

translation.en: And I want you guys to have perspective as you're going through it,
translation.zh: 但我希望你们在经历一切时要有自己的观点

translation.en: and not let this time shape what will be.
translation.zh: 不要让这段时期决定你们的未来

translation.en: So, you're in school.
translation.zh: 所以你要是在学校

translation.en: Be in school. Get your fricking education.
translation.zh: 就好好上学 拼命接受教育

translation.en: You know, Barack and I, all through this presidency,
translation.zh: 贝拉克和我在总统任期

translation.en: through the lies and the stuff they said about us,
translation.zh: 经历那些谎言和人们重伤我们的事时

translation.en: all we could do was wake up every day and do our jobs,
translation.zh: 每天能做的就只有起床做好自己的工作

translation.en: and let our jobs and our lives speak for itself.
translation.zh: 用工作成果和我们的生活去反驳

translation.en: Barack and I are not interested in being at the forefront forever,
translation.zh: 贝拉克和我并不喜欢一直处于领导位置

translation.en: not even for that much longer.
translation.zh: 我们并不想做那么久

translation.en: Everybody here is special, right?
translation.zh: 这所有人都很特别 对吗？

translation.en: You know that, right? Well, that's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 你们知道的 对不对？正是因为如此 我才会来这里

translation.en: We've got this platform.
translation.zh: 我们有这样一个平台

translation.en: If you believe in God, God gave us this platform for a reason,
translation.zh: 如果你相信上帝上帝给了我们这样一个平台

translation.en: so let's not waste it.
translation.zh: 所以不要浪费它

translation.en: -[Michelle] Don't drop the baby. -No.
translation.zh: -别摔着孩子-不会的

translation.en: -Thank you. -She's so cute.
translation.zh: -谢谢-她太可爱了

translation.en: [Michelle] It takes some energy to go high,
translation.zh: 要想走往高处 就必须付出精力

translation.en: and we were exhausted from it.
translation.zh: 但我们真的已经非常疲惫了

translation.en: Because when you're the first black anything...
translation.zh: 因为无论做什么只要你是第一个做的黑人…

translation.en: -[all] Yes. -You know?
translation.zh: -对-你们知道吗？

translation.en: So the day I left the White House,
translation.zh: 所以我离开白宫那天

translation.en: and I write about how painful it was to sit on that stage,
translation.zh: 就写了自己在那个舞台上的艰辛

translation.en: and that a lot of our folks didn't vote.
translation.zh: 当时有很多黑人都没投票

translation.en: So it was almost like a slap in the face.
translation.zh: 那就像是给了我们当头一棒

translation.en: [Michelle] I understand the people who voted for Trump.
translation.zh: 我理解那些投票给特朗普的人

translation.en: The people who didn't vote at all:
translation.zh: 而没有投票的人

translation.en: the young people, the women...
translation.zh: 年轻人、女人…

translation.en: That's when you think, "Man, people think this is a game."
translation.zh: 我就是那时意识到人们把这当成一场游戏而已

translation.en: And it wasn't just in this election, but every midterm.
translation.zh: 不仅是这场选举还有每一场中期选举

translation.en: Every time Barack didn't get the Congress he needed,
translation.zh: 每一次贝拉克没能得到他需要的议席

translation.en: that was because our folks didn't show up.
translation.zh: 都是因为支持我们的人没有出现

translation.en: After all of that work...
translation.zh: 在我们付出那么多努力后

translation.en: they just couldn't be bothered to vote at all.
translation.zh: 他们甚至都不愿意动动手指投票

translation.en: That's my trauma.
translation.zh: 这深深伤害了我

translation.en: Being the First Lady has been the greatest joy of my life.
translation.zh: 成为第一夫人是我一生中最大的快乐

translation.en: But as the first family in the White House,
translation.zh: 但作为入住白宫的第一家庭

translation.en: we had to look at whether what we would say in any given moment:
translation.zh: 我们不得不留心我们每时每刻的说辞

translation.en: what would that mean to the future?
translation.zh: 这对未来意味着什么？

translation.en: What long-term impacts would that have?
translation.zh: 会有什么长远影响？

translation.en: [Gayle] Your iconic line,
translation.zh: 这是你说过的一句名言

translation.en: "When they go low, we go high,"
translation.zh: “当他们堕落时我们应走向更高处”

translation.en: sometimes for many people, it's really hard to hold onto that.
translation.zh: 这对很多人来说很难把控

translation.en: I'm assuming you still maintain that and still believe that.
translation.zh: 那么你现在依旧维持那种观点吗？

translation.en: -I try. -[Gayle] OK, yes.
translation.zh: -我尽量-好吧

translation.en: I try. I try. We're only human.
translation.zh: 我尽量 我们也是人

translation.en: When you're President of the United States, words matter.
translation.zh: 当你是美国总统时你的言辞十分重要

translation.en: You know, you can start wars, you can crash economies.
translation.zh: 你可以开始战争 也可以摧毁经济

translation.en: There's too much power to be that careless.
translation.zh: 你被赋予的权力不容许一丝轻率

translation.en: And so that's how we operated, because...
translation.zh: 所以我们非常谨慎 因为…

translation.en: ...we had to be bigger and we had to go high.
translation.zh: 我们必须更大器 走一条高尚的行径

translation.en: The higher up you go, the higher up you have to be.
translation.zh: 你走的路越高尚你就能去到更高尚的地方

translation.en: We act like it doesn't take a toll on us,
translation.zh: 我们努力装作没有受到影响

translation.en: but you do not understand what toll it takes
translation.zh: 但你不会懂这对总统身边的人

translation.en: on the people around the president.
translation.zh: 会造成何种损伤

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, hi. -Hey, little potato.
translation.zh: -嗨-嘿 小土豆

translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.zh: -嗨-你做得真棒

translation.en: You're so good. I love you too much.
translation.zh: 你真是太棒了 我好爱你

translation.en: I cried again.
translation.zh: 我又要哭了

translation.en: -Why are you always crying? -No, it's always so...
translation.zh: -你为什么哭？-不 只是这总…

translation.en: It's always so...
translation.zh: 总是…

translation.en: [Michelle] What made you cry?
translation.zh: 你为什么哭？

translation.en: But this has demonstrated, in a way,
translation.zh: 但这从某种程度上展现了…

translation.en: just, like, damn, those eight years weren't for nothing, you know?
translation.zh: 那些年并没有白费 对吧？

translation.en: You see that huge crowd out there?
translation.zh: 你看到外面那一大群人了吗？

translation.en: And that last speech you gave about, just, like...

translation.en: People are here because people really believe in love and hope in other people.
translation.zh: 人们之所以会在这里是因为他们对别人的爱和信任

translation.en: And also, every time you guys play Stevie Wonder,
translation.zh: 而且每次你们放史提夫汪达的时候

translation.en: I don't know, I cry a little bit.
translation.zh: 我不知道为何就是会哭

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: -Where are Taylor and Jane? -[Malia] They're just in the car.
translation.zh: -泰勒和简呢？-他们在车上

translation.en: They're in the car? Everybody's in the car already?
translation.zh: 他们在车上？所有人都已经到车上了吗？

translation.en: [Michelle] It's so nice to see you all.
translation.zh: 见到你们真是太好了

translation.en: [woman] Nice to see you!
translation.zh: 我才是很高兴见到你

translation.en: [Michelle] What were you all gonna talk about?
translation.zh: 你们刚才在聊什么？

translation.en: [women] Becoming.
translation.zh: 《成为》

translation.en: I want to eavesdrop.
translation.zh: 我要偷听

translation.en: We saw you last night,
translation.zh: 昨晚我们去看你演出了

translation.en: and you said that you missed your spiritual community.
translation.zh: 你说你怀念你的精神聚会

translation.en: So I want to ask our group,
translation.zh: 所以我想问问大家

translation.en: what advice would you give our First Lady?
translation.zh: 你们想给第一夫人什么建议？

translation.en: [woman] The first reaction, really, is you've got to find your life again.
translation.zh: 我的第一反应是你应该找回属于自己的生活

translation.en: There are so many different phases of you,
translation.zh: 你经历了那么多阶段

translation.en: and a lot of them you forget while you're childrearing,
translation.zh: 但你在经历生孩子、结婚和许多其他事后

translation.en: and married, and all that stuff.
translation.zh: 就会逐渐忘记一些事

translation.en: So my advice to you is just do what you're doing.
translation.zh: 所以我给你的建议就是继续做你现在做的事

translation.en: -Keep on doing it. -[woman 2] Yes.
translation.zh: -继续做就好了-好

translation.en: As my mother says, give it some time.
translation.zh: 就跟我妈妈说的一样“给自己点时间”

translation.en: And I'm so glad you did not get yourself
translation.zh: 我很高兴你没有

translation.en: wrapped up in the fluff of being the First Lady
translation.zh: 在你做第一夫人和住在白宫期间

translation.en: and living in the White House,
translation.zh: 迷失自己

translation.en: and, "My husband is..."
translation.zh: 开口闭口：“我丈夫是…”

translation.en: [Michelle] Your view of me matters.
translation.zh: 你对我的看法很重要

translation.en: Every time we showed up, we showed up to make you all proud.
translation.zh: 我们每次出现就是为了让你们自豪

translation.en: [woman 2] Right. And you did. You did that.
translation.zh: 对 你做到了

translation.en: When I saw you on television, when you were inaugurated,
translation.zh: 我在电视上看你的就职典礼时

translation.en: I said, "I never thought that I would ever see..."
translation.zh: 我说：“我从没想过我能见证这时刻”

translation.en: [woman] Right. My mother said the same thing.
translation.zh: 对 我妈也是那么说的

translation.en: And I look back, and my mother and my father had never seen it.
translation.zh: 当我回顾过去想到我父母没能见到这样的时刻

translation.en: It was something.
translation.zh: 那一刻是全新的篇章

translation.en: -I thank you and Barack for that. -[woman] You saw it for them.
translation.zh: -谢谢你和贝拉克-你替他们见证了

translation.en: I saw it.
translation.zh: 我见证了

translation.en: So it is a blessing.
translation.zh: 所以我真的很荣幸

translation.en: -Yeah. -[woman 3] Michelle, I thank you.
translation.zh: -对-米歇尔 谢谢

translation.en: So God is good.
translation.zh: 所以上帝对我很好

translation.en: -And you will always be First Lady to me. -You will always be First Lady.
translation.zh: -你在我心中永远是第一夫人-你将永远是第一夫人

translation.en: -Forever First Lady. -You will always be First Lady.
translation.zh: -永远的第一夫人-你永远都是第一夫人

translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.zh: 祝你生日快乐

translation.zh: “老”夫人

translation.en: ♪ ...to you ♪
translation.zh: …快乐

translation.zh: -我都快60岁了-我知道

translation.en: -Yay! -I can still blow out the candles.
translation.zh: -太棒了-我还能把蜡烛吹灭

translation.en: -Thanks, you guys. -[woman 2] A little gift.
translation.zh: -谢谢你们-给你个小礼物

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, yeah. -A gift?
translation.zh: -对-生日礼物？

translation.en: -[woman 2] A very not round-to-sixty gift. -A gift!
translation.zh: -给近60岁的完美礼物-礼物

translation.en: What happens when you round to 60?
translation.zh: 在你接近60岁时会发生什么？

translation.en: -Yikes! -[woman] Yeah.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: OK. Is it a magnifying glass?
translation.zh: 好 这是放大镜吗？

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 你仔细看看

translation.en: Oh, it's a selfie-cam!
translation.zh: 是自拍杆

translation.zh: -对-很好用的

translation.zh: 看摄像头 不是遥控器

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: What's next in life?
translation.zh: 生命的下一阶段会有什么？

translation.en: [Michelle] I want to keep working with young people.
translation.zh: 我想继续和年轻人一起共事

translation.en: The future of our nation is up to the next generation.
translation.zh: 我国的命运掌握在我们下一代手中

translation.en: But I know that doesn't just happen.
translation.zh: 我也知道一切不会自然发生

translation.en: Young people need some encouragement.
translation.zh: 年轻人需要鼓励

translation.en: You've got my eyelashes.
translation.zh: 你贴了我的睫毛

translation.en: -Hi. -[woman] Hi, Michelle.
translation.zh: 嗨 米歇尔

translation.en: [Michelle] All right, get it done. Get it done.
translation.zh: 好了 一起来

translation.en: How are you?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: [Michelle] I love you. You guys are up next, OK? So proud of you.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 你们就是我们的未来我为你感到自豪

translation.en: Barack and I are empty-nesters,
translation.zh: 贝拉克和我是空巢老人

translation.en: and that has been exhilarating:
translation.zh: 但能看到我的两个孩子

translation.en: to watch the two little beings you were in charge of grow up.
translation.zh: 逐渐成长 让我们很激动

translation.en: [woman] I'm excited for her to be proud of what she's done,
translation.zh: 我希望她能为自己的成就感到自豪

translation.en: because I think that's the most important thing for a human to do
translation.zh: 因为我认为那是人最需要的

translation.en: is to be proud of themselves.
translation.zh: 就是为自己感到自豪

translation.en: [Malia] No longer facing that same scrutiny,
translation.zh: 我们无需再接受那种安保

translation.en: being able to let all of that leave your mind,
translation.zh: 能随心所欲说话

translation.en: creates so much more space.
translation.zh: 给了我很多自由空间

translation.en: [Michelle] I want to take care of me,
translation.zh: 我想照顾好我自己

translation.en: rediscover my husband...
translation.zh: 重新认识我的丈夫

translation.en: [Michelle] My life is starting to be mine again.
translation.zh: 我的生活又回到了我自己手上

translation.en: There is another chapter waiting for me out there.
translation.zh: 我要去开启生命的下一篇章

translation.en: ♪ Just a sweet word ♪
translation.zh: （女性力量）

translation.en: -[Stephen] Tonight, the 34-stop tour ends. -This is it, y'all.
translation.zh: -这里是34座城市巡回的终点站-对 没错

translation.en: This is it.
translation.zh: 最后一场终于到来了

translation.en: What has this journey been like?
translation.zh: 这场旅行怎么样？

translation.en: What have you learned, maybe about yourself?
translation.zh: 你学到了什么吗？比如关于自己的

translation.en: And what has surprised you most about your travels?
translation.zh: 整段旅途中最让你惊讶的事是什么？

translation.en: I've had the rare experience to see the world in this way,
translation.zh: 我从未有过这种机会以这种方式看世界

translation.en: which is why I feel like I've got to share with you all
translation.zh: 所以我想跟你们分享

translation.en: that, you know, the energy that's out there
translation.zh: 就是我们这里所拥有的力量

translation.en: is much better than what we see.
translation.zh: 比我们能看见的要多得多

translation.en: I wish people didn't feel badly,
translation.zh: 我希望人们不会感到难过

translation.en: because this country is good.
translation.zh: 因为这是个很棒的国家

translation.en: People are good.
translation.zh: 这里的人很好

translation.en: People are decent.
translation.zh: 非常优秀

translation.en: I tell you what I'm nostalgic for.
translation.zh: 我想跟你说我怀念的东西

translation.en: I miss the opportunity we had
translation.zh: 我怀念我们曾经有过的

translation.en: to have leaders who talked to us about hope,
translation.zh: 会跟我们讲希望

translation.en: and the possibility of change, which is what hope is.
translation.zh: 和改变的总统而改变的可能性就是希望

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 那么…

translation.en: here's what I've learned just in this book tour.
translation.zh: 我在这次巡回书展中认识到的是

translation.en: You know, one of the things we do miss about Barack Obama
translation.zh: 我们怀念贝拉克奥巴马的其中一件事是

translation.en: is that he would get out into the country
translation.zh: 他会深入整个国家

translation.en: and he would campaign around hope,
translation.zh: 在竞选演说中讲述希望

translation.en: and he would fill arenas,
translation.zh: 去活动场地演讲

translation.en: and then people would come out and remember,
translation.zh: 人们会走出来 然后回想

translation.en: "Yeah. Yeah. Yeah."
[Michelle] "I do like this."
translation.zh: 我喜欢这个”

translation.en: And then people would be surrounded with each other,
translation.zh: 不同背景的人

translation.en: of all different backgrounds, and they'd go,
translation.zh: 会聚集在一起 认识到

translation.en: "Yeah, I'm not alone in this.
translation.zh: “我并不是孤身一人

translation.en: I like this feeling of not being divided.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这种团结一致的感觉

translation.en: I do."
translation.zh: 我真的喜欢”

translation.en: If we can open up a little bit more to each other and share our stories,
translation.zh: 如果我们能对彼此更加敞开心扉分享自己的故事

translation.en: our real stories,
translation.zh: 我们的真实故事

translation.en: that's what breaks down barriers.
translation.zh: 能帮我们破除隔阂

translation.en: But in order to do that,
translation.zh: 但要做到这点

translation.en: you have to believe that your story has value.
translation.zh: 你们就要相信自己的故事是有价值的

translation.en: Be vulnerable. Dare to be vulnerable.
translation.zh: 展现自己的脆弱 勇于袒露

translation.en: We're at a crossroads
translation.zh: 我们正站在十字路口中间

translation.en: of where we have to think about,
translation.zh: 在这里我们要考虑

translation.en: "Who are we as a nation?"
translation.zh: “作为一个国家 我们是谁？”

translation.en: I remain hopeful that people want better...
translation.zh: 我一直都相信人们想要变更好

translation.en: ...if not for themselves, then for the next generation.
translation.zh: 就算不会为了他们自己也会为了下一代

translation.en: And that is my basic joy.
translation.zh: 而这是我最简单的快乐

translation.en: You know, it gets back to mentoring others.
translation.zh: 这就又回归了我指导别人的老本行

translation.en: That's what I'm going to do until people are like,
translation.zh: 我会继续做下去 直到别人拦下我说

translation.en: "OK, you're done, old lady."
translation.zh: “好了 老太太 可以了”

translation.en: I'll just be on stage in a wheelchair,
translation.zh: 我就坐在轮椅上 在舞台上

translation.en: just going, "And another thing..."
translation.zh: 说：“还有一件事…”

translation.en: You know? And they'll be, like, "Oh, that little old Michelle Obama.
translation.zh: 然后他们说“那个米歇尔奥巴马老太太

translation.en: She's still just talking," you know?
translation.zh: 还是说个不停”

translation.en: I want to be the 90-year-old woman that you just excuse, you know?
translation.zh: 我想成为那个让你想抱怨的90岁老太太

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, join me in thanking Michelle Obama for being here tonight.
translation.zh: 女士们、先生们 我们一起感谢米歇尔奥巴马今晚的出席

translation.en: Thank you all so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你

translation.en: -I am becoming a strong... -Yes.
translation.zh: -我在成为一个坚强…-对

translation.en: -...confident, fierce girl... -Yes.
translation.zh: -自信、勇敢的女孩…-对

translation.en: ...who realizes that I have the power to change the world.
translation.zh: 我知道我有能力改变这个世界

translation.en: -[audience cheering] -Yeah!
translation.zh: 棒极了

translation.en: I am a nonbinary human.
translation.zh: 我是非二元性别者

translation.en: And, um, I am becoming brave
translation.zh: 我在成为一个勇敢的人

translation.en: and unafraid to live openly,
translation.zh: 不害怕公开

translation.en: truthfully and joyfully.
translation.zh: 真诚、快乐地活着

translation.en: I am becoming a mom who is teaching my teenage boys
translation.zh: 我在成为一个母亲教育我正值青春期的儿子们

translation.en: to value and respect strong, smart, independent women.
translation.zh: 珍惜和尊敬坚强、聪慧、独立的女性

translation.en: Thank you!
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: My parents emigrated from Mexico,
translation.zh: 我父母从墨西哥移民而来

translation.en: and because of them,
translation.zh: 因为他们

translation.en: I am becoming a man who is living the American Dream.
translation.zh: 我在成为一个实现美国梦的人
